programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Lola
programme.desc: Ruby struggles to understand the cause behind the rift in her relationship with Paul.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson stars in this hilarious adaptation of the bestseller. A recent college grad takes a job as a live-in nanny for the troubled son of a snooty, neurotic Upper East Side socialite and her nasty, adulterous husband. Laura Linney, Alicia Keys, Chris Evans, Donna Murphy, Paul Giamatti. Directed by Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: James L. Brooks' acclaimed romantic comedy about a plucky New York waitress (Helen Hunt) and a phobic, curmudgeonly novelist (Jack Nicholson). Greg Kinnear costars as his gay neighbor in this story of love, forgiveness and acceptance. The three leads were Oscar-nominated. Cuba Gooding Jr., Skeet Ulrich, Shirley Knight.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Angels Sing
programme.desc: A man is forced to confront his past during the holiday season.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Best in Show
programme.desc: Mockumentary master Christopher Guest takes aim at a prestigious dog show in this blue-ribbon comedy. Guest co-wrote, directed and stars with a great ensemble cast that includes Parker Posey, co-writer Eugene Levy, Catherine O'Hara and Fred Willard. Most of the film was improvised. Michael Hitchcock, Michael McKean.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Hit the Road
programme.desc: This Iranian film follows a mother, father and their two sons: a young adult and a child as they hit the road in an overloaded SUV for a journey across the country. The reason for the mysterious journey is not known at first but as time moves on its dark purpose is revealed.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Signature Move
programme.desc: Zaynab, a Pakistani lesbian working as a lawyer in Chicago, falls for a Mexican-American woman named Alma. At the same time, she tries to keep their relationship and her growing interest in lucha-style wrestling a secret from her live-in mother, who is eager to find her daughter a husband.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Love Means Zero
programme.desc: Featuring the life and work of American tennis coach Nick Bollettieri.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: A battle between good and evil takes place when an orphan begins a quest to find a missing shard of a crystal that holds the world in equilibrium.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Elizabeth: A Portrait in Part(s)
programme.desc: A documentary on the life of Queen Elizabeth II, the longest-lived, longest reigning British monarch and longest serving female head of state in history.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: A Little Game
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl wants to learn how to play chess in order to defeat a rival at school. She takes lessons from an elderly man who's a master at the game, and the pair eventually bond.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: After Yang
programme.desc: After Yang tells the tale of a future where robotic children are purchased as live-in babysitters. Jake and Kyra are the parents of Mika. When Mika's beloved android companion Yang malfunctions, Jake desperately searches for a way to repair him. Along the way, he discovers that his relationships with his wife and child have become distant. The journey takes him on a pathway of rediscovery, allowing him to close that distance and recapture the life that was passing before him.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: A partying troublemaker learns about holiday spirit when a judge sentences him to community service as a referee for a kids team.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Real Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: A raw and striking portrait of noteworthy silent film actor Charlie Chaplin. Never-before-seen clips from Chaplin's candid interview with Life Magazine in 1966 sheds light on the actor's upbringing and unexpected foray into the entertainment industry. The interview, woven together with clips from Chaplin's films, provides a meditation on Chaplin's impact on Hollywood from the actor's own perspective.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: This sumptuous historical drama, set in Constantinople on the verge of World War I, centers on a love triangle between an artist from France, an American journalist and an Armenian medical student who is engaged to a woman from his home village.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Seven Oscar nominations, including Best Picture and Best Actor went to this magical portrait of Scottish playwright J.M. Barrie. The film chronicles his relationship with a young widow and her sons, which inspired "Peter Pan."

programme.title: The Giver

programme.title: Downhill Racer
programme.desc: Robert Redford as an egotist skiing with the U.S. team in Europe. Fine skiing footage; filmed on location. Gene Hackman, Camilla Sparv, Jim McMullan. D.K.: Kenneth Kirk. Mayo: Dabney Coleman. Machet: Karl Michael Vogler. Tommy: Joe Jay Albert. Directed by Michael Ritchie.

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: A look at the 1976 Indiana Hoosiers basketball team, led by coach Bobby Knight, that posted a perfect 32-0 record on their way to winning the NCAA national championship.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Menashe
programme.desc: This moving drama centers on a Hasidic Jewish man living in New York City who fights to retain custody of his son after his wife's death, as tradition dictates that the boy must be raised in a household with a mother. If he doesn't remarry quickly, his son will be adopted by his late spouse's stern brother.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Debunkers, Inc.
programme.desc: Three goofballs start a detective agency at their high school.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: This winning family film stars Eddie Murphy as an ambitious financial whiz who sacrifices time with his 7-year-old daughter (Yara Shahidi) for the sake of his job. One day his daughter's imaginary world unexpectedly helps his career, prompting him to improve their strained relationship. Directed by Karey Kirkpatrick. Thomas Haden Church, Ronny Cox, Martin Sheen.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Ernest scrambles to find a successor for Santa Claus in this Yuletide comedy.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Our Ghosts
programme.desc: Evicted from their apartment, a father and son try to scare new tenants.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: Queen Bees
programme.desc: This comedy film follows a strong-willed and independent senior who moves temporarily into Pine Grove Senior Community, a local retirement community whilst her house undergoes repairs. But as her eyes are opened to making new friends, hobbies, and perhaps even romance, she encounters some residents that remind her of high school cliques all over again.

programme.channel: USA | Showtime Family Zone East HD
programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When Grandpa Ed comes to stay, his grandson Peter must give up his beloved bedroom. However, Peter does not give way so easily, concocting a series of unexpected and unusual schemes to force his imposing grandfather out of his room for good. Based on the novel by Robert Kimmel Smith.

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Sanitation workers witness an altercation through a telescope and find a city official's body in the trash at the same location the next day; they fear being implicated and try to solve the case themselves.

programme.title: Down to Earth
programme.desc: Chris Rock rolls into reincarnation madness in this comedy based on 1978's "Heaven Can Wait." When a heavenly mix-up causes struggling black stand-up comic Lance Barton (Rock) to die before his time, he is sent back down to the mortal world in the form of a rich---and white---old-timer named Charles Wellington. Regina King, Chazz Palminteri, Eugene Levy, Frankie Faison.

programme.title: Head of State
programme.desc: An obscure black politician is chosen to run for president, who astonishes his detractors when his folksy campaign catches fire.

programme.title: Election
programme.desc: In this wickedly funny satire, a high-school teacher tries to thwart a ruthless overachiever who's running for class president by encouraging a dimwitted jock to enter the race. In time, the election also attracts the jock's sister, who pledges to dismantle the student government.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: Seventeen years after a bad hustle left him with a mangled hand, ex-pro bowler Roy Munson (Woody Harrelson) finds his ticket back to the fast lane in a young Amish boy (Randy Quaid), whom he enters in a million-dollar winner-take-all bowling tournament in Reno. Bill Murray, Vanessa Angel, Chris Elliott, William Jordan, Richard Tyson, Lin Shaye.

programme.desc: Three best friends seek a wife for their tactless, motormouthed pal in this endearingly outrageous comedy, but realize they have made a terrible mistake when the woman he falls for proves to be equally as vulgar.

programme.title: Night Falls on Manhattan
programme.desc: Andy Garcia stars in Sidney Lumet's tense tale of police corruption as an idealistic young lawyer whose life is torn apart when he is assigned a high-profile case in which several officers, including his father, were injured or killed by drug dealers. After successfully prosecuting the case, he learns the shocking truth about the criminal justice system, as well as disturbing news about his own family. Lena Olin, Richard Dreyfuss, Ian Holm.

programme.title: Neil Young: Heart of Gold
programme.desc: An old rocker takes a look at his life in song. This intimate and enthralling musical portrait of singer-songwriter Neil Young is highlighted by a bravura concert performance from Nashville's Ryman Auditorium, where he is accompanied by his wife, Pegi, country superstar Emmylou Harris and a host of other musicians. The film is directed by Jonathan Demme ("Stop Making Sense"), and one of the executive producers is Bernard Shakey, a Young nom de plume.

programme.title: Soapdish
programme.desc: A stellar cast parodies soap opera in a behind-the-scenes look at the lives and loves of actors on fictional daytime drama "The Sun Also Sets" starring longtime lead Celeste Talbert who copes with unexpected subplots that could sabotage her popularity on the show which is also facing declining ratings.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Big-screen take on the classic sitcom about a blustery, big-scheming New York City bus driver and his sewer-worker pal.

programme.desc: In this wacky kid-friendly romp, the unlucky Smuntz brothers (Nathan Lane, Lee Evans) inherit a mansion and discover that there's a mouse living on the premises. Unfortunately, the tiny and tenacious tenant has no intention of leaving.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Jim Carrey's vibrant turn ignites this highly imaginative, dark-humored fantasy. Three plucky orphans are sent to live with a distant relative---the dastardly and greedy Count Olaf, who plots to steal the children's considerable inheritance. Based on Daniel Handler's books, the film won an Oscar for Best Makeup and features narration by Jude Law.

programme.desc: Adaptation of the classic Dickens tale of miserly Ebenezer Scrooge, who is visited by the ghosts of past, present and future Christmases.

programme.desc: Jim Henson's Muppets invade the Big Apple in hopes of bringing their show to the Great White Way.

programme.desc: Gonzo steps into his first starring role in this extraterrestrial adventure in which he discovers that his long-lost relatives are from a distant planet. programme.desc: An Ohio advertising exec heads to New York City for a clandestine job interview, but when his wife joins him for a spontaneous trip, they experience a long series of humiliating misadventures in this hilarious remake.

programme.desc: Sally Field gives a strong performance in John Schlesinger's drama about a mother's fight for justice after her daughter is brutally killed. The film opens shockingly as Karen McCann (Field) hears her daughter's murder over the phone. The killer (Kiefer Sutherland) is set free on a technicality, so Karen takes matters into her own hands. Ed Harris, Beverly D'Angelo, Joe Mantegna.

programme.desc: A Texas man struggles to come to terms with his father's murderous past. A drifter helps him put himself back together, but complications arise when he realizes how she's linked to his father's criminal acts.

programme.desc: A bittersweet love story, set in 1942 California, about two buddies (Sean Penn, Nicolas Cage) and their sweethearts. Elizabeth McGovern, John Karlen, Rutanya Alda, Max Showalter, Kate Williamson. Directed by Richard Benjamin.

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: Lyra and Will try to escape the Land of the Dead. Asriel and Mrs. Coulter make a shocking discovery.

programme.desc: While vacationing in Egypt, detective Hercule Poirot finds himself in the thick of a love triangle that goes awry. However, when a wealthy young woman winds up dead, it is up to Poirot to track down the killer before he or she can claim a new victim. Based on the novel of the same name by Agatha Christie.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob, Eureka and Shangela visit Sussex, New Jersey, only a stone's throw from Manhattan but a world apart in its politics. There, they help Ashley find a supportive community beyond her loving parents; bisexual navy vet Josh work through trauma and face accepting his whole self; and Brandon, who might be Shangela's most unexpected "daughter" yet.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: An air marshal pursues a hijacker on a nonstop flight from New York to London in this hair-raising thriller. When the mysterious villain begins killing passengers, the marshal becomes the prime suspect and must fight to clear his name.

programme.title: Random Acts of Flyness
programme.sub-title: Third Dimension: G/d Does Not Submit & Other Applicab
programme.desc: With her other man Xavier in tow, Najja heads out of town to her "sister's" re-birthday to embark on a spirit wave collusion (F.K.A. Ritual) to be reborn, revealed, and healed. But the ancestors always got a trick up their sleeve, trust and believe.

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, high-powered literary agent Jack McCall learns that he has only 1000 words left to speak before dying, due to a curse placed on him by a disgruntled spiritual guru whom he lied to and cheated.

programme.title: Jerrod Carmichael: Rothaniel
programme.desc: Jerrod Carmichael returns for his third stand-up special taped before a live audience at the legendary Blue Note Jazz Club in New York City.

programme.title: The Making Of: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: Inside the making of the newest installment in the "Fast and Furious" franchise.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: In the mid-1950s, Maria catches the eye of Tony, a charming Irish-American, amidst New York City's bustling Upper West Side. Despite their families' misgivings, the pair falls in love, pushing the rivalry between their respective gangs to violence. Based on the 1957 stage musical.

programme.title: Belfast
programme.desc: It is 1969 and 9-year-old Buddy finds his peaceful life disturbed as a national conflict is starting to brew in Northern Ireland: unionists and loyalists—mostly Protestants—want the country to remain within the United Kingdom, while nationalists and republicans—mostly Catholics—are campaigning for the country to join a united Ireland. As the tension between these two opposing forces escalates, he and his family must decide whether to stay, or move somewhere safe.

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: Lyra and Will try to escape the Land of the Dead. Asriel and Mrs. Coulter make a shocking discovery.

programme.title: SHAQ
programme.desc: A champion once again in Miami before age and injuries lead Shaq to the next phase of his life.

programme.title: Branson
programme.desc: The episode chronicles Virgin Atlantic's battle with British Airways, ending in a libel suit win for Branson. From outsider to wealthy capitalist, Branson continues to push for world records and promotional attention for his company, setting off on a nail-biting Pacific Ocean balloon voyage. He announces plans to develop a spaceflight company to take commercial passengers into space, beginning a decade long pursuit.

programme.title: The King's Man
programme.desc: This action-spy thriller prequel features the Duke of Oxford getting wind of a sinister plot to eradicate millions of people in a pre-World War I Europe, being concocted by some of the world's notorious historical figures such as Rasputin. The story follows and unfolds the origins of the Kingsman, the independent intelligence agency.

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: A hugely popular rapper faces a career meltdown when his latest album tanks and his attempts to rehab his image only end in disaster. In time, he considers reuniting with his old rap trio, the Style Boyz, in this hysterical, fast-paced mockumentary.

programme.title: Atsuko Okatsuka: The Intruder
programme.desc: Comedian and actress Atsuko Okatsuka brings her brand of ingenious, offbeat storytelling to the Elsewhere stage in Brooklyn where she dishes on the futile art of impressing teenagers, attending a "Magic Mike Live" show with her grandmother, and the alarming reactions that she and her husband had to the unwanted presence of an intruder.

programme.title: The Matrix Resurrections
programme.desc: This sci-fi series sequel revisits Neo, who seems to be feeling disconnected from his reality as he discusses his personal issues with a therapist-like Analyst. As he's also apparently taking some blue pills, people from his past start reappearing, offering him a red pill and some missing truths about his actual reality.

programme.title: Hard Knocks In Season: Arizona Cardinals
The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teens awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment in this thrilling adaptation of the best-selling YA novel. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organization hint at a sinister agenda.

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: On a night flight to Miami, a hotel manager (Rachel McAdams) becomes a pawn in a plot to assassinate the Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security. Horror master Wes Craven (the "Scream" movies) directed this nail-biting suspense thriller. Cillian Murphy, Brian Cox, Jayma Mays.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton and Ben Affleck star in this action-packed thrill ride. Desperate to stop a gigantic asteroid from wiping out humanity, NASA recruits misfit oil drillers to deliver a nuclear bomb that will blow up the massive rock. Jerry Bruckheimer produced and Michael Bay directed. Steve Buscemi, Liv Tyler, Keith David, Will Patton, Owen Wilson.

programme.title: The Full Monty
programme.desc: In this delightful, Oscar-nominated comedy, unemployed, out-of-shape English steel workers decide to take up exotic dancing after seeing the success of the Chippendale Dancers. They practice their bumping and grinding and plot to strip down to nothing---all the while trying to summon the courage to face the truth about their individual lives. Robert Carlyle, Tom Wilkinson, Mark Addy.

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: Zach Braff wrote, directed and stars in this quirky comedy-drama. He plays a slacker who must confront his estranged New Jersey family when he returns home for his mother's funeral.

programme.title: Hard Knocks In Season: Arizona Cardinals
Red
programme.desc: Retired CIA hit man Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) and his former colleagues race to find out why they've been targeted for death by their former organization and uncover a conspiracy implicating some prominent politicians in this rousing action comedy.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: This version of Frank Herbert's popular 1965 sci-fi novel is the first of a two-part adaptation. This story covers only the first half of the novel and features Paul Atreides, whose duke father, Leto, accepts the stewardship of a planet called Arrakis. Since it's the main source of a most coveted substance called the melange, the leadership of its mining industry has been contentious, which the heir of the House Atreides will soon find out.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: The shadowy operation Task Force X recruits notorious criminals Bloodsport, Harley Quinn, and Peacemaker to assemble a rag-tag team of their most volatile compatriots from the Belle Reve prison for a secretive mission to Corto Maltese island. Yet the anti-heroes only find themselves embroiled in a conflict against a horde of powerful foes eager to cause their violent demise.

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: A single, child psychologist breaks up with his live-in girlfriend when he learns that she is pregnant.

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, an aquarium cleaner tries to erase a monstrous debt by taking up the world's oldest profession in this hilarious comedy.

As events intensify, they find themselves embarking on a mission to escape the facility and save their lives, putting their newfound friendship and powers to the ultimate test.

programme.title: The New Mutants
programme.desc: When Illyana, Rahne, Sam, Danielle, and Roberto — five teenage mutants who are just discovering their superhuman abilities — are held inside an isolated hospital to be psychologically monitored, strange occurrences begin to happen. As events intensify, they find themselves embarking on a mission to escape the facility and save their lives, putting their newfound friendship and powers to the ultimate test.

programme.title: X2
programme.desc: Director Bryan Singer reassembles the cast of his 2000 adaptation of the Marvel comic. This time, Prof. Xavier forms an alliance with his rival, Magneto, to fight a plot to eliminate mutants hatched by a crazed government scientist.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Peeper
programme.desc: Spoof of classic Hollywood private-eye capers, with Michael Caine as a bumbling detective searching for a man's long-lost daughter in 1940s Los Angeles. Natalie Wood, Michael Constantine, Kitty Winn, Thayer David, Dorothy Adams. Peter Hyams directed.

programme.title: Intent to Kill
programme.desc: Assassins try to kill a South American president in a hospital. Richard Todd. Nancy: Betsy Drake. McNeill: Alexander Knox. Menda: Herbert Lom. Finch: Warren Stevens. Carla: Lisa Gastoni. Well directed by Jack Cardiff.

programme.title: From the Terrace
programme.desc: Adaptation of John O'Hara's novel about the loveless marriage of a socialite (Joanne Woodward) and a man (Paul Newman) dedicated to his career. Martha: Myrna Loy. Eaton: Leon Ames. Porter: George Grizzard. Natalie: Ina Balin. Hardie: Felix Aylmer. Clemmie: Barbara Eden. Jim: Patrick O'Neal. Directed by Mark Robson.

programme.title: Holiday for Lovers
programme.desc: The adventures of a Boston family in Brazil, with Clifton Webb as a father who disapproves of his daughters' romances. Jane Wyman, Jill St. John, Carol Lynley. Barroso: Paul Henreid. Paul: Gary Crosby. Carlos: Nico Minardos. GI: Gardner McKay. Jose Greco: Himself. Light, good-natured family fun. Directed by Henry Levin.

programme.title: On the Riviera
programme.desc: Two roles for Danny Kaye: an American entertainer and a French hero, with mix-ups resulting. Gene Tierney, Corinne Calvet. Lebrix: Marcel Dalio. Dancers: Ellen Ray, Gwen Verdon. Periton: Jean Murat. Gapeaux: Sig Ruman. Walter Lang directed.

programme.title: Dear Brigitte
programme.desc: An 8-year-old (Billy Mumy) has a passion for Brigitte Bardot. Harmless family fare. James Stewart, Glynis Johns, Fabian. Pandora: Cindy Carol. Captain: Ed Wynn. Directed by Henry Koster.

programme.title: Peeper
programme.desc: Spoof of classic Hollywood private-eye capers, with Michael Caine as a bumbling detective searching for a man's long-lost daughter in 1940s Los Angeles. Natalie Wood, Michael Constantine, Kitty Winn, Thayer David, Dorothy Adams. Peter Hyams directed.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: High-octane action and rollicking humor drive this buddy film. After losing his driver's license, a bumbling cop (Jimmy Fallon) teams up with a brassy cabbie (Queen Latifah) so he can pursue a team of women bank robbers led by a comely Brazilian (Gisele Bundchen). Based on the 1998 French film "Taxi," which was written by Luc Besson. Jennifer Esposito, Ann-Margret.

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Meddling parents discover that their three teenage daughters have made a pact to lose their virginities on prom night. They decide to intervene and stop them by following the girls during the night's various wild festivities.

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Sam Rockwell stars in this terrifying sci-fi thriller about a lonely astronaut extracting a precious gas from the moon that promises to reverse the Earth's energy crisis. For three years, Sam Bell has dutifully harvested Helium 3. Now, with only two weeks to go on his contract, Sam's health starts to deteriorate. When a routine extraction goes horribly awry, Sam awakens back at the base with no memory of the accident and meets a doppelgänger who claims he's there to fulfill the same contract.

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
programme.desc: A slick, fast-paced update of the Shakespeare tragedy, set in the violent netherworld of Verona Beach, where the Montague and Capulet families battle for power and territory... an age-old rivalry defied by two young lovers. Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Brian Dennehy, John Leguizamo, Pete Postlethwaite, Paul Sorvino, Diane Venora, Harold Perrineau, Paul Rudd, Jesse Bradford, Dash Mihok.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Will Smith stars in this adaptation of Isaac Asimov's classic sci-fi stories, a thrilling blend of high-tech effects and slam-bang action. Smith plays a cop who uncovers a conspiracy involving murderous robots in 2035, but he's unable to get anyone to believe him.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: The dream team of acting titans Robert De Niro and Al Pacino give commanding performances in this charged psychological thriller. They portray veteran NYPD detectives hot on the trail of a clever serial killer who's been gunning down vicious felons who have been able to escape being convicted of their crimes. Their investigation leads them to a most surprising conclusion. Carla Gugino, Curtis '50 Cent' Jackson, John Leguizamo, Donnie Wahlberg, Brian Dennehy. Directed by Jon Avnet.

programme.title: Narc
programme.desc: Two disturbed detectives join forces to investigate an undercover cop's murder. As they develop mutual respect for one another, unethical conduct reveals dark truths that could split them apart. Writer-director Joe Carnahan shot the film in 27 days, and spent the last 10 working on the climactic finale set in an actual chop shop.

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: Sidesplitting battle-of-the-sexes romp about an estranged couple uncomfortably sharing their condo.

programme.title: Take Me Home Tonight
programme.desc: In this hilarious and nostalgic comedy, aimless MIT graduate Matt Franklin (Topher Grace) sends out the '80s with a bang after being invited to an end-of-summer bash by Tori Frederking, his former high-school crush. Meanwhile, Matt's sarcastic twin sister Wendy urges him to get his life together, and his best friend Barry displays a wild streak the size of the Mississippi River.

programme.title: Cats
programme.desc: A tribe of unruly and anthropomorphic city cats, the Jellicles, approach their yearly ceremony. The tribe must elect one of their ranks to venture to the Heaviside Layer and reincarnate as a new life in the Jellicle tribe. Based on the poetry collection by T.S. Eliot.

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Stealing Harvard
programme.desc: A hardworking Everyman turns to a life of crime in this peppy comedy directed by Bruce McCulloch, who starred in TV's "The Kids in the Hall." Jason Lee plays timid John Plummer, who needs a quick $30,000 for his niece's Harvard University tuition. John teams up with his slacker pal (Tom Green), and together they become bumbling burglars to net the cash. Leslie Mann, Dennis Farina.

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: A gubernatorial candidate hires a campaign worker to keep his imbecilic brother out of trouble.

programme.title: Because I Said So
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Diane Keaton teams up with rising star Mandy Moore in this charming romantic comedy about an overprotective mom whose plan to find the perfect man for her youngest daughter backfires. Gabriel Macht, Tom Everett Scott, Lauren Graham, Piper Perabo.

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Taut and engrossing fact-based thriller featuring tour-de-force performances by Ryan Phillippe and Chris Cooper. Phillippe plays an FBI trainee who is assigned to keep an eye on a fellow agent (Cooper) suspected of selling information to the Soviets. The film is based on the life of convicted spy Robert Hanssen. Directed by Billy Ray ("Shattered Glass"), who co-wrote the script with Adam Mazer and William Rotko. Laura Linney, Caroline Dhavernas, Gary Cole.

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: In this visually stunning adventure drama, a zookeeper's son is stranded at sea aboard a lifeboat with a zebra, an orangutan, a hyena and a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping an assassination attempt on Air Force One, the president ends up stranded in the wilderness of Finland in this pulse-pounding thriller. A 13-year-old hunter soon finds him, and they work together to evade a group of terrorists.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: This taut William Friedkin thriller features powerhouse performances by Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson. Jackson plays a Marine colonel on trial for a mission that went horribly wrong; Jones is his lawyer, a friend who doubts his innocence. Ben Kingsley,Guy Pearce, Bruce Greenwood.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Following Stuart Shepard, a New York publicist who, after using a pay phone to call his mistress, finds himself on the wrong end of a terrifying call.

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: This wonderfully unconventional biopic of Beach Boy composer Brian Wilson focuses on two seminal periods in his life: his creative triumphs and mental breakdown as a young man, and his struggles in middle age to wrench free from a domineering therapist.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Best Actor Oscar nominee Johnny Depp perfectly embodies the title role in Tim Burton's bloody well-done adaptation of the Stephen Sondheim musical about the vengeful owner of a tonsorial parlor that offers customers more than just a shave and a haircut. Helena Bonham Carter costars as Mrs. Lovett, who makes a killing with her new pie recipe containing a special meaty ingredient.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: Jude Law defines charisma in this funny, insightful and sometimes poignant portrait of an unabashed philanderer. Law plays Alfie, a Manhattan chauffeur who begins to reevaluate his shallow ideas about women and romance. The comedy-drama is a remake of the 1966 Michael Caine film of the same name. Marisa Tomei, Susan Sarandon, Jane Krakowski, Nia Long, Omar Epps.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: The Animal
programme.desc: Rob Schneider is hilarious in this comedy about Marvin Mange, an aspiring cop who undergoes "transspecies" surgery after a car accident. When he recovers, Mange has the physical prowess of a beast and must work feverishly to control his animal instincts if he is to win the heart of a perky environmental activist (Colleen Haskell). John C. McGinley, Edward Asner, Adam Sandler.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are revealed in this hilarious crime comedy. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita try to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs.

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: An elite cop protects a witness from a murderous cult.

programme.title: The Forgotten
programme.desc: Julianne Moore ("The Hours") and Gary Sinise ("CSI: New York") star in a riveting thriller you'll never forget. Moore plays a mother who's grieving over the loss of her son when she's told the child never existed. Dominic West, Anthony Edwards, Alfre Woodard.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: This epic romantic fantasy tells the story of Ethan, a young man who falls for Lena, a new girl in his small town, only to discover she comes from a mysterious family, all of whom all possess supernatural powers. Together, they team up to break a curse that casts Lena's entire future in doubt.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: After a robbery goes awry, a young man must call on his drug-smuggling former boss to protect his girlfriend from mobsters who want to kill both of them and retrieve their cargo.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Con men, both working the Riviera, trample on each other's turf; they make a bet that will force one of them to leave.

programme.title: The Lost City
programme.desc: When an eccentric billionaire kidnaps introverted novelist Loretta Sage to locate the ancient city featured in her latest book, Loretta's charming yet vapid cover model, Alan, vows to prove his real-life heroism matches his fictional alter-ego and embarks on a harebrained mission to rescue Loretta.

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
programme.desc: In this explosively funny sequel, the most trusted, yet cluelessly obnoxious TV newsman in the San Diego market moves to New York along with his crew, including his wife and coanchor, his most trusted reporter, his high-energy sports guy and his exceedingly dim weatherman to launch a brand-new, 24-hour news station.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An obnoxious private detective who specializes in recovering lost pets is hired to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot, and ends up searching for some of the team's players after they go missing as well.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The pet detective travels to Africa to locate a rare bat that is sacred to rival tribals.

programme.title: The Lost City
programme.desc: When an eccentric billionaire kidnaps introverted novelist Loretta Sage to locate the ancient city featured in her latest book, Loretta's charming yet vapid cover model, Alan, vows to prove his real-life heroism matches his fictional alter-ego and embarks on a harebrained mission to rescue Loretta.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The minds of two cinematic geniuses meld in this visionary sci-fi epic directed by Steven Spielberg and based on a treatment by Stanley Kubrick. Haley Joel Osment is extraordinary as a robot programmed to have human emotions. After he is abandoned by his adoptive parents, he sets out to become a real boy.

programme.title: My Little Pony: The Movie
programme.desc: In this delightful animated adventure, Twilight Sparkle and the rest of the Mane 6 must go on an epic journey to defend their homeland of Equestria from fearsome invaders. Along the way, the ponies make a number of new friends, including a pirate crew.

programme.title: Run the Race
programme.desc: Rebellious football star Zach and his religious track athlete brother Dave have an unbreakable bond despite struggling to provide for themselves and deal with their alcoholic father. After Zach gets injured, he ruins his chance at a scholarship. It's up to Dave to save their future and help his bitter brother find his way back to God.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: The '70s-trapped Bradys must travel to Hawaii to save the family after Carol's first husband shows up and threatens their idyllic existence. As Carol is torn between two husbands, Mike struggles to hold the family together and Alice cooks a lot of meat loaf. Shelley Long, Gary Cole, Tim Matheson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Christine Taylor, Paul Sutera, Jennifer Elise Cox, Henriette Mantel.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: A mildly hyperactive Catholic schoolgirl tries to find fame as a movie star in order to get the boy she likes to kiss her. This outrageous comedy is based on a recurring sketch from "Saturday Night Live."

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
programme.desc: In this explosively funny sequel, the most trusted, yet cluelessly obnoxious TV newsman in the San Diego market moves to New York along with his crew, including his wife and coanchor, his most trusted reporter, his high-energy sports guy and his exceedingly dim weatherman to launch a brand-new, 24-hour news station.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An obnoxious private detective who specializes in recovering lost pets is hired to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot, and ends up searching for some of the team's players after they go missing as well.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The pet detective travels to Africa to locate a rare bat that is sacred to rival tribals.

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: Past Oscar winners Tommy Lee Jones and Benicio Del Toro go one-on-one in this tense thriller. When a former special-operations soldier begins killing hunters in the Oregon wilderness, the FBI enlists a retired tracker to catch him. Directed by William Friedkin ("The French Connection," "The Exorcist"), the film features thrilling chases and plenty of suspense.

programme.title: Nick of Time
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant is thrown into a nightmare by forces beyond his control when he is randomly chosen by a mysterious duo who make a harrowing demand: Either assassinate the governor of California, or they will kill his 10-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Richard Gere and Oscar nominee Edward Norton star in this intense courtroom drama. Gere plays slick lawyer Martin Vail, who agrees to defend a guileless 19-year-old (Norton) who has been accused in the brutal murder of the Archbishop of Chicago. Though Vail sees the case as a way to gain publicity, the revelations in the case begin to chill him.

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Complex drama about an Army warrant officer (John Travolta) investigating the apparent rape and murder of the daughter of a politically ambitious base commander. Madeleine Stowe. James Woods steals several scenes as an intense colonel. William Goldman ("Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid") co-wrote the script from Nelson DeMille's novel. Simon West directed.

programme.title: Nick of Time
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant is thrown into a nightmare by forces beyond his control when he is randomly chosen by a mysterious duo who make a harrowing demand: Either assassinate the governor of California, or they will kill his 10-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Without a Paddle: Nature's Calling
programme.desc: Two friends and a British nature enthusiast search the wilderness for a high-school sweetheart in this rollicking sequel starring Oliver James. As the stakes get higher and the squirrels turn hostile, the hapless trio attempt to navigate a raging river and realize that sometimes nature isn't all it's cracked up to be. Kristopher Turner, Rik Young.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: An honorable gunslinger protects a lonely woman and her son in the old Southwest.

programme.title: Win a Date With Tad Hamilton!
programme.desc: Robert Luketic ("Legally Blonde") directed this cheery comedy about a self-centered movie star (Josh Duhamel) who tries to repair his bad-boy image by dating a naive fan (Kate Bosworth). No one is more surprised than the star when he begins to fall for the small-town girl. Nathan Lane, Sean Hayes, Gary Cole.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: An elderly man takes his grandson on a decadent road trip across the United States in this sidesplitting hidden-camera comedy.

programme.title: Primal Fear
programme.desc: Richard Gere and Oscar nominee Edward Norton star in this intense courtroom drama. Gere plays slick lawyer Martin Vail, who agrees to defend a guileless 19-year-old (Norton) who has been accused in the brutal murder of the Archbishop of Chicago. Though Vail sees the case as a way to gain publicity, the revelations in the case begin to chill him.

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Julian is a stylish and successful male prostitute whose life goes downhill when he's framed for murder after doing a pimp a favor. The only person he can trust is a politician's wife who is frustrated with her husband, and is the only woman he sleeps with who doesn't pay for his services.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Complex drama about an Army warrant officer (John Travolta) investigating the apparent rape and murder of the daughter of a politically ambitious base commander. Madeleine Stowe. James Woods steals several scenes as an intense colonel. William Goldman ("Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid") co-wrote the script from Nelson DeMille's novel. Simon West directed.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: An ingenious and cynical international thief---who adopts the names of saints as his aliases---feels his professional shell cracking when he steals a secret formula for cold fusion from a beautiful scientist. Val Kilmer and Elisabeth Shue star in this stylish and action-packed thriller based on author Leslie Charteris's famous spy character. Rade Serbedzija.

programme.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
programme.desc: Remake of Erich Maria Remarque's classic about the horrors of war, seen from the point of view of a young German soldier (Richard Thomas). Ernest Borgnine, Ian Holm, Donald Pleasence, Patricia Neal. Westhaus: Colin Mayes. Tjaden: Mark Drewry. Behm: Mark Elliott.

programme.title: The Blue & the Gray
programme.sub-title: The Blue And The Gray Part I
programme.desc: A three-part Civil War miniseries that unfolds through the eyes of John Geyser (John Hammond), an artist and war correspondent who, in Part 1, reports on the trial of insurrectionist John Brown (Sterling Hayden); meets President Lincoln (Gregory Peck); and covers the battle of Bull Run. Jonas Steele: Stacy Keach. Ben Geyser: Lloyd Bridges. Maggie Geyser: Colleen Dewhurst. Jonathan: Paul Winfield.

programme.title: The Blue & the Gray
programme.sub-title: The Blue And The Gray Part II
programme.desc: Part 2 chronicles the marriage of Jonas and Mary (Stacy Keach, Julia Duffy); the battlefront experiences of Union soldier Malachy Hale (Brian Kerwin) and his Confederate cousin Luke Geyser; and the travels of correspondent John Geyser (John Hammond) through the South. Luke: Dan Shor. Kathy Reynolds: Kathleen Beller. President Lincoln: Gregory Peck. Senator Reynolds: Robert Vaughn.

programme.title: The Blue & the Gray
programme.sub-title: The Blue And The Gray Part III
programme.desc: Conclusion. Lincoln (Gregory Peck) delivers the Gettysburg Address (1863); the Geysers defend their homestead; and Robert E. Lee (Robert Symonds) surrenders to U.S. Grant (Rip Torn) at Appomattox. John Geyser: John Hammond. Kathy Reynolds: Kathleen Beller. Jonas Steele: Stacy Keach. Mrs. Lovelace: Geraldine Page. General Meade: Rory Calhoun.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Black Hawk Down; Taken 3; Liam Neeson.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns: The Luck of the Draw
programme.desc: Kenny Rogers makes it four of a kind as Brady Hawkes in this two-part Western enhanced by the appearances of stars from TV oaters, who re-create their roles. Part 1 features Hugh O'Bryan as Wyatt Earp and Chuck Connors as "The Rifleman." Burgundy: Reba McEntire. Ethan: Rick Rossovich.

programme.title: The Gambler Returns: The Luck of the Draw
programme.desc: Conclusion. Wagers at a rodeo and a boxing match are prelude to bigger bets for Brady (Kenny Rogers) in five-card stud. Ethan: Rick Rossovich. Burgundy: Reba McEntire. Lute: Christopher Rich. Sir Colin: Patrick Macnee. President Roosevelt: Claude Akins.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Prop Makers; Shia LaBeouf.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent who once guarded the President of the United States is demoted to the less challenging assignment of overseeing security for his daughter, only to have it become the most dangerous mission of her life when the teen is kidnapped.

programme.title: First Target
programme.desc: The Secret Service scrambles to thwart a complicated plot to assassinate the President. Daryl Hannah, Gregory Harrison. Grant Coleman: Doug Savant. Kelsey: Brandy Ledford. Stewart McCall: Peter Flemming. Ryan Nicholson: Gary Bakewell. J.P.: Tom Butler. Nina Stahl: Ona Grauer. Evan Stahl: Aaron Grain. Filmed in Vancouver.

programme.title: First Shot
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent (Mariel Hemingway) springs into action to protect the President from a murderous American rebel group. Grant Coleman: Doug Savant. President Jonathan Hayes: Gregory Harrison. Jess Hayes: Jenna Leigh Green. A follow-up to the cable films "First Daughter" and "First Target."

programme.title: El Mariachi
programme.desc: When a wandering guitarist is mistaken for a hit man in a small Mexican town, it creates a lot of trouble as the body count rises.

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: El Mariachi, a former musician who now carries an arsenal in his guitar case, hunts down the drug dealer responsible for the death of his girlfriend. During his mission, he falls for a sexy bookstore owner.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: John Ritter is an electronics expert out to avenge his wife's terrorist-style murder. Olivier Gruner, Robert Culp, Ed Lauter, Michael Zelniker, Martin Kove, Lara Harris.

programme.title: Murphy's Romance
programme.desc: A widowed small-town pharmacist develops a reticent affection for a spunky divorcé, but soon her ex-husband returns and moves back in with her, claiming things will be different. Based on the novella by Max Schott.

programme.title: Gambler II---The Adventure Continues
programme.desc: Part 1 of two. Kenny Rogers reprises his 1980 role, here on the trail of a killer who kidnapped his young son. Linda Evans, Bruce Boxleitner. McCourt: Mitchell Ryan. Jeremiah: Charlie Fields. Stowbridge: Harold Gould. Greeley: Cameron Mitchell. Silvera: Gregory Sierra. Directed by Dick Lowry.

programme.title: Gambler II---The Adventure Continues
programme.desc: Conclusion. Kenny Rogers reprises his 1980 role, here on the trail of a killer who kidnapped his young son. Linda Evans, Bruce Boxleitner. McCourt: Mitchell Ryan. Jeremiah: Charlie Fields. Stowbridge: Harold Gould. Greeley: Cameron Mitchell. Silvera: Gregory Sierra. Directed by Dick Lowry.

programme.title: Love and Bullets
programme.desc: Charles Bronson goes undercover in Switzerland to protect a gangster's mistress (Jill Ireland). Rod Steiger, Bradford Dillman. Louis: Strother Martin. Vittorio: Henry Silva. Huntz: Paul Koslo. Cook: Sam Chew. Lobo: Michael Gazzo. Directed by Stuart Rosenberg.

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: Glenn Ford as a sadistic Army officer out to control post-Civil War Colorado. William Holden, Ellen Drew. Big Ed: Ray Collins. Doc: Edgar Buchanan. Johnny: Jerome Courtland. Jericho: James Millican. Nagel: Jim Bannon. Henry Levin directed.

programme.title: The Man From Laramie
programme.desc: A cowboy is obsessed with finding the man who sold automatic rifles to the Apaches, resulting in the death of his brother.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: An outlaw driven to murder the man who killed his foster father questions his goals after falling in love with a devout Quaker.

programme.title: Absolute Deception
programme.desc: A woman investigates her ex-husband's double life with the help of a federal agent.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: Romance and showdowns are the ingredients in this Randolph Scott entry. Joan Leslie, Ellen Drew, Alexander Knox, Richard Rober. Clagg: John Russell. Virk: Cameron Mitchell. Well-made. Andre de Toth directed.

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend
programme.desc: The events of the 1885-86 Army campaign against the Apache leader as seen from the viewpoint of a young officer.

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: Psychological study of three cowboys pursued by a posse.

programme.title: The Ambushers
programme.desc: Superagent Matt Helm trails another power-mad spy chief, this time in Mexico. His mission is to secure a flying-saucer weapon that's fatal to men, but not to women.

programme.title: Sniper 3
programme.desc: Tom Berenger returns as rugged sharpshooter Thomas Beckett in the third installment of the action-packed film series. This time, National Security Agency bigwigs hire Beckett for a covert operation to execute an alleged terrorist. But Beckett begins to reconsider the mission when he suspects that his bosses have ulterior motives. Denis Arndt, John Doman, William Duffy.

programme.title: The Final Countdown
programme.desc: Kirk Douglas skippers a nuclear aircraft carrier that's time-warped to Pearl Harbor. Martin Sheen, Katharine Ross, James Farentino, Charles Durning. Thurman: Ron O'Neal. Simura: Soon-Teck Oh. Black Cloud: Victor Mohica. Perry: James C. Lawrence. Directed by Don Taylor.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: A widowed mom strikes up a reluctant friendship with her new aloof neighbor, who just learned she has a long-lost sibling. As they embark on a quest to find this sibling, the two women begin to feel less lonely.

programme.title: Five More Minutes: Moments Like These
programme.desc: A young widow's Christmas wish for her son is answered in unexpected ways when she goes back to her old home.

programme.title: Unlocking Christmas
programme.desc: When a holiday riddle and a mysterious key land on their doorsteps, Kevin and Kate go on a Christmas adventure they will never forget.

programme.title: The Christmas Doctor
programme.desc: Zoey is a traveling doctor who prefers short assignments to staying put, so when she is assigned to a small town clinic for the holidays, she is surprised when she starts to feel at home.

programme.title: Christmas in My Heart
programme.desc: Beth, a violinist, agrees to give lessons to the daughter of Sean, a lonesome country music singer to help the girl prepare for an upcoming Christmas concert.

programme.title: A Princess for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman (Katie McGrath) and her niece and nephew spend Christmas with a wealthy duke (Roger Moore), the children's grandfather. Though the down-and-out trio feel out of place among royalty at first, they soon begin to settle in and connect as a family. Sparks also begin to fly between the woman and the duke's son (Sam Heughan). Directed by Michael Damian.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Miracle of Love
programme.desc: Brought together by community service, Eric and Joy find new purpose at Christmas. As they help a family rebuild their home, coincidences and a medical miracle lead them to believe in destiny.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Harper returns home to Memphis for the holidays and she nannies for wealthy widower Owen as she awaits news about a job opportunity overseas. As they grow close, she encourages him to spend more time with his children, while he encourages her to have more confidence. They soon develop feelings for one-another, and she soon realizes how much she enjoys living near family. Now she must decide if her home for the holidays will be her forever home.

programme.title: Return to Christmas Creek
programme.desc: After a career failure, Amelia reconnects with her best friend, who helps her rediscover family at Christmas.

programme.title: The Gift of Peace
programme.desc: Traci lost her faith after tragedy, but begins to find inspiration, hope, and peace with a new community when she joins a grief support group at Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: Music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition. She's shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is actually working for the company Meg's fighting.

programme.title: Love You Like Christmas
programme.desc: An executive gets detoured on her way to a wedding and winds up in Christmas-loving town, which awakens her to what's been missing in her life.

programme.title: Northern Lights of Christmas
programme.desc: Zoey's plan to buy her own plane is thrown off course when she inherits a reindeer farm.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's A Mrs. Miracle Christmas
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle partners with a grieving family to help boost their holiday spirits.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Dashing Through the Snow
programme.desc: An airport snafu strands a holiday traveler, so she and a kind stranger share the last rental car and head to Seattle. After some discord, they begin to bond, but that changes when the woman learns her travel buddy is an FBI agent assigned to trail her.

programme.title: The Christmas Bow
programme.desc: When an accident puts her music dreams on hold, a gifted violinist reconnects with an old family friend, who helps her heal and find love during the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: As Michelle's wedding approaches, Hannah steps up to help finish the launch of the new Evergreen museum while questioning her relationship and future with Elliot.

programme.title: Miss Christmas
programme.desc: A city's expert holiday-tree finder visits a small town to inspect a young boy's perfect tree, but she soon discovers his father isn't willing to part with this pristine evergreen.

programme.title: A Christmas Duet
programme.desc: Well-loved music duo Averie and Jesse, famous for their duet "Wouldn't Be Christmas," haven't played together since they went their separate ways years ago. Averie gave up music and opened a beautiful lodge in a snowy Vermont town.

programme.title: Holiday Hearts
programme.desc: While planning an annual Christmas party, Peyton is forced together with Ben to care for a friend's daughter. While finding their Christmas spirit, will there be some romance along the way?

programme.title: Christmas Bells are Ringing
programme.desc: Photographer Samantha returns to Cape Cod to celebrate Christmas and her father's wedding. Anxious to revisit past memories, she finds new meaning in her photography, and falls in love.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: A wife longs to be single again, so a Christmas angel grants her this wish, but before long, she realizes she made a mistake and attempts to win back the husband she loves.

programme.title: Swept Up By Christmas
programme.desc: An antique dealer and a cleaner clash when downsizing a magnificent estate before Christmas. As they uncover the home's treasures, they help reconnect the reclusive owner with his Christmas past.

programme.title: Christmas On My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress, assuming she's about to marry the love her life Zach Callahan, only to discover they broke up two years ago, and her fiancé isn't Zach.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A lonely, obsessive cable installer becomes fixated on a customer.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A New York cop tries to deprive terrorists of their quarry at a Washington, D.C., airport.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: It's a battle for control over High Water and dreams of power, fame and fortune. Many secrets are revealed including the real murderer of East-O and the true identity of Saint Clip.

programme.title: School Dance
programme.desc: In this delightful coming-of-age story, a high-school student tries to join an elite dance crew in the hope of winning the attention of his dream girl.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In this star-studded period drama, two con artists are recruited by an FBI agent to infiltrate the treacherous world where New Jersey's politics and the mob intersect. However, it's never quite clear who is the swindler and who is the mark.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A factory worker is branded a spy after an attempt to take a virtual vacation goes horribly awry. Later, he joins a resistance movement in order to defeat a high-tech tyrant, and tries to recover his true identity in this mind-bending sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: In this exciting thriller based on the hit '80s TV series, an ex-Black Ops agent emerges from self-imposed retirement and decides to help the downtrodden after he saves a young woman from vicious Russian gangsters.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A New York cop tries to deprive terrorists of their quarry at a Washington, D.C., airport.

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: In this uproarious holiday farce, an uptight optometrist hits the roof when his neighbor decides to decorate his house with enough Christmas lights to be seen from space.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: Thrills, chills and laughter abound in this adventure comedy about late-night security guard who is put to the test after the exhibits in the Smithsonian come to life and begin wreaking havoc. Determined to save the museum from destruction, Larry takes on a loose T. rex, Attila the Hun and Roman gladiators eager to wage the epic battles of years gone by.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: Lloyd Vogel is tasked with creating a profile of Fred Rogers, the creator and star of the successful children's program Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. He dutifully goes to the studio where his subject is filming his show, and soon enough, he is sitting down with him, asking him probing questions. However, Fred seems to have a different plan in mind. The interviewee suddenly becomes the interviewer, and he starts to help the writer sent for him in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A reclusive woman starts a new life in a small North Carolina town, and reluctantly falls for a widowed father who helps her confront her troubled past in this affecting romantic drama.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Christmas in Paradise
programme.desc: Three sisters locate their estranged father in a house in the Caribbean. As they enjoy the Christmas sunshine, they work to figure out why he ran away in the first place.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: This film based on the novel Shrine by James Herbert sees a journalist investigate the supernatural abilities of a young girl after an alleged visit from the Virgin Mary. Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman and Ewan McGregor star in this audacious and visually stunning musical romance. Kidman plays Satine, a courtesan and dance-hall performer at the famous Parisian nightclub; McGregor is Christian, the up-and-coming writer who loves her; and John Leguizamo adds superb support as Toulouse-Lautrec. Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh, Kylie Minogue. Baz Luhrmann ("Strictly Ballroom") co-wrote and directed.

programme.title: A Journal for Jordan
programme.desc: In the early 2000s, Charles Monroe King, a sergeant, awaits deployment to Iraq to fight in the war. He is married to Dana, and they recently had a newborn son named Jordan. Dana gifts Charles a journal notebook so he can write to his son his musings and life lessons he wants to share.

programme.title: I'll Find You
programme.desc: Robert is a Catholic opera singer in a relationship with Jewish violinist Rachel. Together, they have dreams of performing at Carnegie Hall. But the German invasion of Poland during World War II separates them, potentially ending this hope. Robert vows that he will find Rachel, journeying into the heart of Nazi Germany and facing the potential tragedy of her being lost to him forever.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A reclusive woman starts a new life in a small North Carolina town, and reluctantly falls for a widowed father who helps her confront her troubled past in this affecting romantic drama.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Created in a San Francisco lab by an ambitious father-and-son scientist team seeking to cure Alzheimer's disease, genetically engineered chimp Caesar (Andy Serkis) uses his powerful intellect to lead an ape uprising in this thrilling sci-fi prequel.

programme.title: A Journal for Jordan
programme.desc: In the early 2000s, Charles Monroe King, a sergeant, awaits deployment to Iraq to fight in the war. He is married to Dana, and they recently had a newborn son named Jordan. Dana gifts Charles a journal notebook so he can write to his son his musings and life lessons he wants to share.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: This film based on the novel Shrine by James Herbert sees a journalist investigate the supernatural abilities of a young girl after an alleged visit from the Virgin Mary. Traveling to a small New England town, the journalist begins to uncover a more sinister truth surrounding the girl in this gothic horror film.

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
programme.desc: A slick, fast-paced update of the Shakespeare tragedy, set in the violent netherworld of Verona Beach, where the Montague and Capulet families battle for power and territory... an age-old rivalry defied by two young lovers. Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Brian Dennehy, John Leguizamo, Pete Postlethwaite, Paul Sorvino, Diane Venora, Harold Perrineau, Paul Rudd, Jesse Bradford, Dash Mihok.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Will Smith stars in this adaptation of Isaac Asimov's classic sci-fi stories, a thrilling blend of high-tech effects and slam-bang action. Smith plays a cop who uncovers a conspiracy involving murderous robots in 2035, but he's unable to get anyone to believe him.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: The dream team of acting titans Robert De Niro and Al Pacino give commanding performances in this charged psychological thriller. They portray veteran NYPD detectives hot on the trail of a clever serial killer who's been gunning down vicious felons who have been able to escape being convicted of their crimes. Their investigation leads them to a most surprising conclusion. Carla Gugino, Curtis '50 Cent' Jackson, John Leguizamo, Donnie Wahlberg, Brian Dennehy. Directed by Jon Avnet.

programme.title: Narc
programme.desc: Two disturbed detectives join forces to investigate an undercover cop's murder. As they develop mutual respect for one another, unethical conduct reveals dark truths that could split them apart. Writer-director Joe Carnahan shot the film in 27 days, and spent the last 10 working on the climactic finale set in an actual chop shop.

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: Sidesplitting battle-of-the-sexes romp about an estranged couple uncomfortably sharing their condo.

programme.title: Take Me Home Tonight
programme.desc: In this hilarious and nostalgic comedy, aimless MIT graduate Matt Franklin (Topher Grace) sends out the '80s with a bang after being invited to an end-of-summer bash by Tori Frederking, his former high-school crush. Meanwhile, Matt's sarcastic twin sister Wendy urges him to get his life together, and his best friend Barry displays a wild streak the size of the Mississippi River.

programme.title: Cats
programme.desc: A tribe of unruly and anthropomorphic city cats, the Jellicles, approach their yearly ceremony. The tribe must elect one of their ranks to venture to the Heaviside Layer and reincarnate as a new life in the Jellicle tribe. Based on the poetry collection by T.S. Eliot.

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding crime thriller, a man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organized-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Stealing Harvard
programme.desc: A hardworking Everyman turns to a life of crime in this peppy comedy directed by Bruce McCulloch, who starred in TV's "The Kids in the Hall." Jason Lee plays timid John Plummer, who needs a quick $30,000 for his niece's Harvard University tuition. John teams up with his slacker pal (Tom Green), and together they become bumbling burglars to net the cash. Leslie Mann, Dennis Farina.

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: A gubernatorial candidate hires a campaign worker to keep his imbecilic brother out of trouble.

programme.title: Because I Said So
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Diane Keaton teams up with rising star Mandy Moore in this charming romantic comedy about an overprotective mom whose plan to find the perfect man for her youngest daughter backfires. Gabriel Macht, Tom Everett Scott, Lauren Graham, Piper Perabo.

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Taut and engrossing fact-based thriller featuring tour-de-force performances by Ryan Phillippe and Chris Cooper. Phillippe plays an FBI trainee who is assigned to keep an eye on a fellow agent (Cooper) suspected of selling information to the Soviets. The film is based on the life of convicted spy Robert Hanssen. Directed by Billy Ray ("Shattered Glass"), who co-wrote the script with Adam Mazer and William Rotko. Laura Linney, Caroline Dhavernas, Gary Cole.

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: In this visually stunning adventure drama, a zookeeper's son is stranded at sea aboard a lifeboat with a zebra, an orangutan, a hyena and a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping an assassination attempt on Air Force One, the president ends up stranded in the wilderness of Finland in this pulse-pounding thriller. A 13-year-old hunter soon finds him, and they work together to evade a group of terrorists.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: This taut William Friedkin thriller features powerhouse performances by Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson. Jackson plays a Marine colonel on trial for a mission that went horribly wrong; Jones is his lawyer, a friend who doubts his innocence. Ben Kingsley,Guy Pearce, Bruce Greenwood.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: Following Stuart Shepard, a New York publicist who, after using a pay phone to call his mistress, finds himself on the wrong end of a terrifying call.

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: This wonderfully unconventional biopic of Beach Boy composer Brian Wilson focuses on two seminal periods in his life: his creative triumphs and mental breakdown as a young man, and his struggles in middle age to wrench free from a domineering therapist.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Best Actor Oscar nominee Johnny Depp perfectly embodies the title role in Tim Burton's bloody well-done adaptation of the Stephen Sondheim musical about the vengeful owner of a tonsorial parlor that offers customers more than just a shave and a haircut. Helena Bonham Carter costars as Mrs. Lovett, who makes a killing with her new pie recipe containing a special meaty ingredient.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A 21st-century construction worker discovers that his entire memory of the past derives from a chip implanted in his brain.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: Jude Law defines charisma in this funny, insightful and sometimes poignant portrait of an unabashed philanderer. Law plays Alfie, a Manhattan chauffeur who begins to reevaluate his shallow ideas about women and romance. The comedy-drama is a remake of the 1966 Michael Caine film of the same name. Marisa Tomei, Susan Sarandon, Jane Krakowski, Nia Long, Omar Epps.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: The Animal
programme.desc: Rob Schneider is hilarious in this comedy about Marvin Mange, an aspiring cop who undergoes "transspecies" surgery after a car accident. When he recovers, Mange has the physical prowess of a beast and must work feverishly to control his animal instincts if he is to win the heart of a perky environmental activist (Colleen Haskell). John C. McGinley, Edward Asner, Adam Sandler.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: A drug shipment is sent to the wrong address, prompting a frantic race to recover the package before its contents are revealed in this hilarious crime comedy. Brody (Mike Epps) and Guch have mistakenly received a package containing 10 kilos of cocaine. If they can just find a buyer, they'll be rich. Meanwhile, intended recipients Jesus and Chita try to track down the shipment before drug lord Bodego Diablo realizes it's missing. But Bodega already knows the score and he wants his drugs.

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: An elite cop protects a witness from a murderous cult.

programme.title: The Forgotten
programme.desc: Julianne Moore ("The Hours") and Gary Sinise ("CSI: New York") star in a riveting thriller you'll never forget. Moore plays a mother who's grieving over the loss of her son when she's told the child never existed. Dominic West, Anthony Edwards, Alfre Woodard.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: This epic romantic fantasy tells the story of Ethan, a young man who falls for Lena, a new girl in his small town, only to discover she comes from a mysterious family, all of whom all possess supernatural powers. Together, they team up to break a curse that casts Lena's entire future in doubt.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: After a robbery goes awry, a young man must call on his drug-smuggling former boss to protect his girlfriend from mobsters who want to kill both of them and retrieve their cargo.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: An unorthodox society partakes in a twelve-hour period of legalized crime once every year, allowing the citizens' wildest and darkest fantasies to come to light. However, things quickly descend into chaos as the crimes escalate in violence and the death toll continues to rise in this final installment of "The Purge" franchise.

programme.title: It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Murder
programme.desc: In the middle of preparing for her business' biggest season, Diana Hart learns she inherited an old house from her beloved aunt. Matt, the estate attorney and her former flame, insists she stick around and sort out the details over Christmas break, as he tries to rekindle their old romance. But the longer Diana stays the more she finds clues that suggest her aunt was murdered, and that the culprit might be her handsome companion. Yet the bigger question is: will she survive Christmas.

programme.title: Secrets In The Wilderness
programme.desc: Seeking marriage counseling becomes a dangerous endeavor when pregnant wife Lisa is forced to do rigorous bonding activities in the remote wilderness with her emotionally distant husband, Tyler. As Lisa struggles to keep up with the activities and connect with Tyler, she begins to question their counselor's intentions.

programme.title: Stalked by My Doctor
programme.desc: A heart surgeon flirts with a teenage girl whose life he saved, but her family won't believe her. The doctor becomes obsessed with the girl and fakes her death so that he can have her all to himself.

programme.title: Evil Doctor
