Based on a friend's recommendation, they go to the best OBGYN in Los Angeles, Dr. Natalie Barnes. She is gorgeous, fit, and intelligent... but Natalie is not the hero she seems to be. She switches sonograms and lies to Aubrey about her needing bed rest, effectively putting Aubrey out of the picture as she attempts to seduce Matt. Dr. Barnes.

programme.title: The Doctor Will Kill You Now
programme.desc: After a tragic skiing accident, Sarah's life is saved thanks to a brilliant surgeon, Dr. Vincent. But when Dr. Vincent mistakes Sarah's, determined to have her at any cost.

programme.title: Psycho Nurse
programme.desc: Mira and Todd are struggling to come to terms with their son's newly diagnosed condition requiring a special diet and physical treatment in order to live. They hire a live-in nurse, Gwen, who plans to take Todd and their son from Mira in order to become the new mother of the household. When Mira feels constantly fatigued and nauseous, it becomes clear Gwen is an "angel of death" who is intent on turning this family into her forever home.

programme.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
programme.desc: Having escaped from the psychiatric prison, Dr. Albert Beck (Eric Roberts) hides out in an empty house–until its new owners unexpectedly arrive to move in! Forced into the attic to evade the recently widowed mother, Beck watches from above–undeniably attracted to her 18-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Malicious Motives
programme.desc: Ashley, a popular high school student desperate for a liver transplant, begins to question her social outcast classmate and prospective donor's increasingly strange behavior.

programme.title: Mr. Soft Touch
programme.desc: A gambler robs the gangsters who murdered his business partner and is pursued by the mob. He hides in a settlement house and is soon reformed by the woman who works there.

programme.title: Going My Way
programme.desc: Best Picture winner tells the tale of a warmhearted young priest who starts a choir with the tough local kids when he is assigned to a parish overseen by a conservative older priest who has little interest in new ideas. Bing Crosby and Barry Fitzgerald, as the younger and older clerics, respectively, won Best Actor and Best Supporting Actor, and Leo McCarey also won for Best Director. The tune "Swingin' on a Star" was awarded Best Song.

programme.title: The Holly and the Ivy
programme.desc: Home for Christmas, a parson (Ralph Richardson) and his family face their hopes and regrets. Jenny: Celia Johnson. Margaret: Margaret Leighton. Mick: Denholm Elliott. David: John Gregson. Richard: Hugh Williams. Lydia: Margaret Halstan. Bridget: Maureen Delaney. Directed by George More O'Ferrall.

programme.title: O. Henry's Full House
programme.desc: A series of five short segments enact favorite stories from author O. Henry, most notably The Cop and the Anthem.

programme.title: Period of Adjustment
programme.desc: An exploration of the problems facing newlyweds who tied the knot on a whim, and an older married couple, the husband of whom got hitched because he stood to inherit his father-in-law's business. An adaptation of a Tennessee Williams play.

programme.title: Fanny and Alexander
programme.desc: Ingmar Bergman's Oscar-winning study of life in a family, as seen through the eyes of two children (Pernilla Allwin, Bertil Guve) in 1907 Sweden. Helena: Gunn Wallgren. Lydia: Christina Schollin. Oscar: Allan Edwall. Carl: Borje Ahlstedt. Other Oscars include Best Cinematography and Costumes.

programme.title: Christmas Past
programme.desc: A compilation of silents shorts celebrates the Yuletide holiday.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Faithful version of the Charles Dickens classic about miserly Ebenezer Scrooge who, after being visited by three ghosts on Christmas Eve, learns the meaning of the true spirit of the holiday. Reginald Owen took the role of Scrooge in place of an ailing Lionel Barrymore. Real-life husband and wife Gene and Kathleen Lockhart play Mr. and Mrs. Bob Cratchit, and their daughter June costars as a Cratchit daughter.

programme.title: Carol for Another Christmas
programme.desc: Updating of Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol" tells the tale of a melancholy father mourning the son he lost in World War II, until his holiday grieving is interrupted by visits from the ghosts of Christmases past, present and future.

programme.title: Alias Boston Blackie
programme.desc: While reformed safecracker Boston Blackie performs a magic act at a prison, an innocent convict disappears and goes off to track down and kill the criminals who framed him, so Blackie sets off to stop him.

programme.title: Crooks Anonymous
programme.desc: Spoof about an organization which helps crooks to reform---although not too well. Leslie Phillips, Julie Christie, Wilfrid Hyde-White, James Robertson Justice, Michael Medwin. Some amusing moments. Directed by Ken Annakin.

programme.title: Blast of Silence
programme.desc: A hired killer (Allen Baron) stalks his victim in New York City. Ralph: Larry Tucker. Petey: Danny Meehan. Thug: Joe Bubbico. Lorrie: Molly McCarthy. Effective location photography. Directed by Allen Baron.

programme.title: 3 Godfathers
programme.desc: Three bandits on the run in the Arizona desert discover a dying woman and her baby, and promise the mother they'll see that the infant makes it to civilization.

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut
programme.desc: The columnist for a national housekeeping magazine, as part of a promotional stunt, welcomes a returning war hero into her country estate, the only problem is she's a klutz in the kitchen, where she's never been at home on the range.

programme.title: Holiday Affair
programme.desc: A department-store clerk meets a war widow who's shopping at Christmastime and romance ensues, much to the displeasure of her stuffed-shirt attorney boyfriend.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Adaptation of Louisa May Alcott's classic slice of Americana about the four spirited March sisters and details their adventures, ambitions and romances in 1860s Massachusetts.

programme.title: Auntie Mame
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee is about a young impressionable orphan who receives a dizzyingly wild upbringing from his eccentric madcap aunt who detests nonsense in others but loves it in herself. The script is based on Patrick Dennis' autobiographical novel that also spawned a Broadway hit and was made into a movie musical in 1974.

programme.title: Beyond Tomorrow
programme.desc: The spirits of three dead bachelors killed in an airplane crash try to help a couple find happiness after setting the pair up while they were still alive.

programme.title: Blossoms in the Dust
programme.desc: A woman devotes her life to helping care for illegitimate children and finding them loving homes after her own child dies at a young age. She eventually becomes a significant political figure who erases the stigma of illegitimacy by changing the information required on birth certificates.

programme.title: The Curse of the Cat People
programme.desc: The father of a 6-year-old girl with a vivid imagination and an inability to get along with other children fears that she may be exhibiting the tendencies of his late wife, who believed she was a catwoman.

programme.title: The Thin Man
programme.desc: First and best of the famous whodunit series has the wisecracking, martini-sipping husband-and-wife sleuthing team of Nick and Nora Charles investigating the disappearance of an inventor who later is implicated in the murder of his secretary. The film, an adaptation of a Dashiell Hammett private-eye classic, was followed by five sequels. Incidentally, "The Thin Man" refers to the inventor, not Nick Charles.

programme.title: Susan Slept Here
programme.desc: A Hollywood screenwriter working on a script about juvenile delinquents takes in a female teenage troublemaker to help with his research, and has to deal with a fiancée who thinks that the relationship is more than platonic. The film's opening narration is provided by an Oscar statuette. This was actor-singer Dick Powell's final big-screen appearance.

programme.title: Never Say Goodbye
programme.desc: An artist tries to reconcile with his divorced wife

programme.title: Bachelor Mother
programme.desc: When a man mistakes a pretty, fun-loving department-store clerk for the mother of a foundling baby, he becomes determined to keep mom and child together, much to her dismay.

programme.title: Ma and Pa Kettle at Home
programme.desc: The Kettles play host to a fussy contest judge to help their son win a college scholarship.

programme.title: The Lion in Winter
programme.desc: Sumptuous adaptation of the play about royal-family intrigue in 1183 involving King Henry II, his estranged wife Eleanor of Aquitaine and their three sons who make up the line of succession.

programme.title: Maria by Callas
programme.desc: This documentary chronicles the life of Greek-American opera singer Maria Callas in her own words. Through a combination of archive interviews and candid videos, the Callas paints a picture of herself. Featuring vintage footage of her famous friends and supporters, including billionaire Aristotle Onassis and Jacqueline Kennedy, actors Brigitte Bardot and Omar Sharif, Queen Elizabeth II and Grace Kelly, Princess of Monaco.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: An ex-criminal gets back from jail and should face the evil spirit of his past.

programme.title: Novitiate
programme.desc: In this intelligent drama, a young woman decides to become a Catholic nun in 1950s Tennessee. As her training progresses, however, her faith is tested by the convent's Mother Superior, who is horrified by the Vatican II reforms of the early '60s.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: In 1960s Los Angeles, silver screen actor Rick Dalton and his stunt double turned best friend, Cliff Booth, struggle to keep pace with the swiftly evolving entertainment industry. They both work to continue their notoriety while facing the demise of Hollywood's Golden Age.

programme.title: Stay
programme.desc: Director Marc Forster's follow-up to the fanciful "Finding Neverland" is this stylish and intricately plotted psychological thriller about a psychiatrist (Ewan McGregor) and his mad dash to save a suicidal young patient (Ryan Gosling) who is planning to celebrate his 21st birthday by killing himself. Written by David Benioff, who created the screenplays for "25th Hour" and "Troy."

programme.title: Long Weekend
programme.desc: A struggling writer (emotionally and financially) falls head over heels with a charismatic and enigmatic woman while living in his friend's garage. Their magnetic romance brings each other hope and optimism during a dark and challenging point in their lives.

programme.title: Thank You for Smoking
programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart lights up the screen in this hilarious satire about a gleefully amoral tobacco industry lobbyist who stops at nothing to put a positive spin on smoking as he clashes with a senator (William H. Macy), who wants to snuff out cigarettes. Maria Bello, Adam Brody, Sam Elliott, Katie Holmes, Rob Lowe. Directed by Jason Reitman.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: In 1960s Los Angeles, silver screen actor Rick Dalton and his stunt double turned best friend, Cliff Booth, struggle to keep pace with the swiftly evolving entertainment industry. They both work to continue their notoriety while facing the demise of Hollywood's Golden Age.

programme.title: I'm Charlie Walker
programme.desc: In the early 1970s, a man must deal with a racist Bay Area corporation as he cleans up a massive oil spill. Charlie Walker, a black contractor who had trouble finding work, takes it upon himself to break the mold and make a name for himself. Based on a true story.

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: In this gripping Western thriller, the new sheriff of a border town investigates a cartel arms deal that went wrong. He tries to put the pieces together in order to unravel the gun-running organization responsible for the outbreak of violence.

programme.title: Long Weekend
programme.desc: A struggling writer (emotionally and financially) falls head over heels with a charismatic and enigmatic woman while living in his friend's garage. Their magnetic romance brings each other hope and optimism during a dark and challenging point in their lives.

programme.title: Jockey
programme.desc: Aging jockey Jackson refuses to admit that his body can no longer withstand the demands of the sport. When rookie jockey Gabriel arrives at the track, Jackson feels inspired by the young man's grit and vows to claim one final championship before his time is up, all the while grappling with an unexpected revelation from Gabriel.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: In 1960s Los Angeles, silver screen actor Rick Dalton and his stunt double turned best friend, Cliff Booth, struggle to keep pace with the swiftly evolving entertainment industry. They both work to continue their notoriety while facing the demise of Hollywood's Golden Age.

programme.title: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio
programme.desc: A 1950s housewife with 10 kids and an alcoholic husband keeps her family afloat by winning prize money in jingle and slogan-writing contests. Julianne Moore shines in this warm and affectionate true story. Woody Harrelson, Laura Dern. Jane Anderson directed and wrote the film.

programme.title: American Chaos
programme.desc: An examination of the furver behind behind President Trump looks back on his 2016 Presidential campaign and spotlights those who supported him during that time, and if they feel he is living up to the promises he made when he was running for President.

programme.title: Stay
programme.desc: Director Marc Forster's follow-up to the fanciful "Finding Neverland" is this stylish and intricately plotted psychological thriller about a psychiatrist (Ewan McGregor) and his mad dash to save a suicidal young patient (Ryan Gosling) who is planning to celebrate his 21st birthday by killing himself. Written by David Benioff, who created the screenplays for "25th Hour" and "Troy."

programme.title: I'm Charlie Walker
programme.desc: In the early 1970s, a man must deal with a racist Bay Area corporation as he cleans up a massive oil spill. Charlie Walker, a black contractor who had trouble finding work, takes it upon himself to break the mold and make a name for himself. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Nine Days
programme.desc: At a waystation in a remote desert, Will, an arbiter, interviews prospective souls for rebirth. Yet the sudden death of a treasured soul upends Will's fragile, unusual existence. Amidst his grief, Will must confront his own arrested potential with the help of the empathetic Emma to achieve catharsis.

programme.title: Parallel Mothers
programme.desc: In a maternity ward, two women of disparate backgrounds find their lives entwining in an unexpected way. Middle-aged Janis eagerly awaits her new arrival as Ana, a traumatized teen, fears what the future may hold for her and her new child. As the women navigate the trials of childbirth and the impending expectations of motherhood, they develop an intricate, complex bond that irrevocably alters the course of their lives.

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: This historical biopic chronicles the last three years in the life of writer Oscar Wilde, during which he traveled across Europe after serving time in prison for his relationships with other men. Along the way, Wilde gets caught up in a love triangle with his literary executor and a petulant young man.

programme.title: Heart of Champions
programme.desc: In 1999, a close-knit team of rowers at an Ivy League institution experiences a renewed sense of hope with their new coach, an ex-soldier. As the young men navigate the highs and lows of their rowing season, they learn the true value of brotherhood in the face of overwhelming adversity.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: Toni Collette and Cameron Diaz shine as a pair of mismatched sisters in this touching character study. Collette is the sensible, driven one, and Diaz is an irresponsible, self-centered party girl who may have stepped on her sibling's toes once too often. Shirley MacLaine is excellent as their grandmother, a Florida retiree whom the women thought was dead. Directed by Curtis Hanson. Mark Feuerstein, Ken Howard, Candice Azzara, Norman Lloyd, Francine Beers.

programme.title: Summertime
programme.desc: This loosely structured dramedy follows the intersecting lives of 25 young Angelinos as they go about Los Angeles on a single hot summer day. A fast-food worker, a roller skating guitarist, and two aspiring rappers turn to creative self-expression to give voice to their hopes, traumas, joys, and agonies.

programme.title: Parallel Mothers
programme.desc: In a maternity ward, two women of disparate backgrounds find their lives entwining in an unexpected way. Middle-aged Janis eagerly awaits her new arrival as Ana, a traumatized teen, fears what the future may hold for her and her new child. As the women navigate the trials of childbirth and the impending expectations of motherhood, they develop an intricate, complex bond that irrevocably alters the course of their lives.

programme.title: Nine Days
programme.desc: At a waystation in a remote desert, Will, an arbiter, interviews prospective souls for rebirth. Yet the sudden death of a treasured soul upends Will's fragile, unusual existence. Amidst his grief, Will must confront his own arrested potential with the help of the empathetic Emma to achieve catharsis.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Wild Indian
programme.desc: This thriller follows the lives of Michael and his cousin Ted-O decades after they took part in the murder and cover-up of a classmate. Michael has reinvented himself whilst Ted-O is fresh out of jail. But Ted-O wants to clear his conscience and Michael cannot afford the truth to be known.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Sela and Christopher are part of a 30-person space odyssey that takes place sometime in the near future. The mission includes people from various generations sent out to scope the universe for a possible new home for humans. However, being inside a ship takes its toll on the people inside it, as panic and paranoia take over, unraveling them back to their primal state.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
programme.desc: The MacManus brothers (Norman Reedus and Sean Patrick Flanery) return to take on the mob after a local priest is killed in cold blood, and the result is a wild trip through the violent Boston underworld. Billy Connolly, Clifton Collins Jr., Julie Benz. Directed by Troy Duffy.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat sequel, a young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss tries to avenge a brutal crime in this mesmerizing and inventive drama, which unfolds in reverse chronological order.

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: In this visually stunning adventure drama, a zookeeper's son is stranded at sea aboard a lifeboat with a zebra, an orangutan, a hyena and a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker.

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: A gifted medical student puts his education in jeopardy when he decides to celebrate his 21st birthday with two rowdy pals the night before a crucial exam in this sidesplitting comedy.

programme.title: Blue Velvet
programme.desc: Spawned from the weird and wonderful mind of David Lynch, this surreal cult hit stars Kyle MacLachlan as a denizen of an All-American lumber town who discovers its dark underside when he's lured into an erotic murder mystery involving a sexy singer (Isabella Rossellini) and a drug-addicted sadist (Dennis Hopper).

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Two hapless gym employees find a computer disc containing a CIA agent's company secrets and decide to blackmail him to pay for plastic surgery.

programme.title: Absolute Power
programme.desc: This gripping thriller tells the story of a master thief who breaks into a D.C. mansion and witnesses a murder involving the President. As a result, the thief becomes a marked man. Resisting his instinct to flee, he decides to fight for justice.

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: This exhilarating martial-arts fantasy film stars Justin Chatwin as Goku, an 18-year-old who must save the world by securing seven mysterious Dragonballs. With the help of his friends and years of martial-arts training, he sets off on his heroic journey. Directed by James Wong. Chow Yun-Fat.

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: In this intensely terrifying chiller, six young women become trapped underground with gruesome creatures while exploring a remote Appalachian cave. Shauna Macdonald, Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring. Written and directed by Neil Marshall.

programme.title: The Descent: Part 2
programme.desc: The traumatized lone survivor of a spelunking trip gone wrong is forced to return to the cave to help a rescue team discover the whereabouts of her missing friends, who fell victim to deadly underground creatures.

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Gripping epic, set just prior to WWII, bursts at the seams with charismatic star turns by Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman. She's a prim English aristocrat who returns to Australia to claim an inherited ranch, and he's a rugged drover who helps her battle wealthy land-grabbers trying to steal it from her. To make matters worse, the Japanese are threatening to invade the continent. Bryan Brown, Jack Thompson, Essie Davis, Brandon Walters. Produced, cowritten and directed by Baz Luhrmann.

programme.title: 12 Years a Slave
programme.desc: The harrowing true story of Solomon Northup, a free black man in 1800s New York who was kidnapped and forced into slavery on a plantation near New Orleans. Later, he fights for his freedom with the help of a Canadian abolitionist.

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: It specialist Emmanuel takes a trip to the U.S. in a bid to get over a failed relationship. He becomes entwined in a reality TV mix up with a notorious gang.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: "South Park" creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone supply most of the voices for an all-puppet cast in this uproariously profane, razor-sharp satire. The film tracks a blindly patriotic cop squad on their quest to stamp out global tyranny and terrorism. Other voice talent includes Kristen Miller, Daran Norris, Maurice LaMarche and Masasa.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel in this stylish and exciting update of the trendy 1980s cop series.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: A traumatized CIA agent must prevent terrorists from unleashing a biological attack on London. When she is forced to go on the run after being betrayed, she teams up with an ex-soldier to complete her mission.

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: Renny Harlin directed this suspenseful thriller about a group of FBI trainees who've gathered to study profiling techniques, only to soon discover that there is a killer among them. Val Kilmer, Christian Slater, LL Cool J, Jonny Lee Miller, Kathryn Morris, Patricia Velasquez.

programme.title: Revolver
programme.desc: After seven years inside, a conman is determined to take revenge on a mob boss.

programme.title: Bend It Like Beckham
programme.desc: You don't have to be a soccer fan to get a kick out of this delightful coming-of-age comedy. It's the story of an English teen (Parminder K. Nagra) whose dreams of athletic stardom clash with the wishes of her traditional Sikh family. The title refers to British soccer phenom David Beckham. Gurinder Chadha directed. Keira Knightley, Jonathan Rhys-Meyers, Anupam Kher, Alan Paxton, Juliet Stevenson, Shaheen Khan, Ameet Chana.

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: In this philosophical sci-fi drama, a biologist who specializes in the human eye makes a discovery that has profound implications for his understanding of mankind.

programme.title: Casa de mi Padre
programme.desc: A rancher named Armando attempts to settle his late father's debts, and in the process he clashes with a ruthless Mexican drug lord in this riotous Will Ferrell comedy. Meanwhile, Armando deals with his attraction to his brother's fiancée.

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Sissy Spacek star in this chilling ghost story based on the documented case of a family in early 19th-century rural Tennessee that is haunted by an evil spirit. James D'Arcy, Rachel Hurd-Wood. Directed by Courtney Solomon.

programme.title: Master Of The Drunken Fist: Beggar So
programme.desc: Due to a conspiracy, wealthy So Chan loses everything. Saved by the Beggars' Sect, he learns the long lost martial art Drunken Fist to defeat the person who framed him.

programme.title: Sleeping With the Enemy
programme.desc: A battered wife is stalked by her abusive husband after faking her death to start a new life.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: In this fantastical, poignant comedy, a man who spends much of his time lost in elaborate daydreams goes on an adventure around the world in order to retrieve a photo negative that the magazine he works for needs.

programme.title: Smokin' Aces
programme.desc: This explosive, energetic crime opus, set in a glitzy Lake Tahoe hotel, rides shotgun with a wild collection of assassins as they gun for lowlife magician Buddy "Aces" Israel (Jeremy Piven), who is turning state's evidence against the mob. Ben Affleck, Ray Liotta, Ryan Reynolds, Taraji Henson, Andy Garcia, Peter Berg. Wayne Newton has a cameo as himself. Singer Alicia Keys and rapper Common make their big-screen debuts. Written and directed by Joe Carnahan.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: A motormouthed high-school security guard joins his girlfriend's brother, a decorated police officer, on a ride-along through the mean streets of Atlanta in this wild action comedy. In the process, he learns that life on the force is no picnic.

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this explosive action thriller about a Las Vegas magician who's enlisted by an FBI agent (Julianne Moore) to help prevent a terrorist attack because he can see two minutes into the future. Jessica Biel, Thomas Kretschmann, Tory Kittles. Directed by Lee Tamahori.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Laurie Strode comes out triumphant in her showdown with Michael Myers after she leaves him burning in a cage in her basement. Though badly injured, she begins to feel a sense of relief, thinking she has finally gotten rid of her lifelong tormentor. When the bloodbath resumes, she is alerted that the evil serial killer has survived and that once again, she has to gear up to take him on. This time, however, Haddonfield rallies behind her, intent on eliminating Michael once and for all.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in the incredible true story of a rebel German army officer who led a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler and overthrow his ruthless Nazi regime during World War II. Bryan Singer ("X-Men") directs this suspenseful thriller. Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson.

programme.title: The Mule
programme.desc: A 90-year old retired veteran desperately takes on a delivery job to save his failing business. What he thought was a simple job, turned out to be a drug run for a Mexican cartel. After becoming successful at it, he comes to the attention of a ruthless DEA agent, and that's when the mistakes of his past come back to haunt him. He must now redeem his sins before either the law or the cartel catch up to him.

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: Halle Berry's Oscar-winning performance highlights this wrenching tale about racism, redemption and the power of love. She plays a poor Southern waitress who falls for a prison guard (Billy Bob Thornton) following the execution of her husband (played by rapper Sean Combs). Peter Boyle, Heath Ledger.

programme.title: Doc Hollywood
programme.desc: A plastic surgeon finishes his residency and heads for a lucrative job in L.A. Distracted, he plows into a fence and is sentenced to community service and fence repair in a small South Carolina town.

programme.title: Cadillac Man
programme.desc: A fast-talking car salesman who is down on his luck and in over his head uses his wits to save lives when the insanely jealous husband of a dimwitted showroom receptionist takes the dealership hostage.

programme.title: The Book Thief
programme.desc: In this thought-provoking drama, a young girl moves in with foster parents in Nazi Germany and shares her love of books she's stolen along the way with the Jewish man who has sought refuge in her new home.

programme.title: The Help
programme.desc: In this stirring drama directed by Tate Taylor, a débutante (Emma Stone) in 1960s Mississippi sends her community into an uproar by conducting a series of probing interviews with the black female servants of the area's most-prominent families.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss tries to avenge a brutal crime in this mesmerizing and inventive drama, which unfolds in reverse chronological order.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: An unorthodox society partakes in a twelve-hour period of legalized crime once every year, allowing the citizens' wildest and darkest fantasies to come to light. However, things quickly descend into chaos as the crimes escalate in violence and the death toll continues to rise in this final installment of "The Purge" franchise.

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: In this taut thriller, forensics expert Alex Cross investigates the disappearance of a senator's daughter, a student at a prestigious private academy.

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A suicidal former Union soldier ends up joining a Sioux tribe. He then takes up arms to defend them when the Army attacks.

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Two hapless gym employees find a computer disc containing a CIA agent's company secrets and decide to blackmail him to pay for plastic surgery.

programme.title: Dude, Where's My Car?
programme.desc: Two slackers have an excellent adventure in this riotous comedy. After a wild night they don't remember, dimwits Jesse (Ashton Kutcher) and Chester (Seann William Scott) search valiantly for Jesse's missing car. Along the way, they encounter a money-hungry transsexual stripper, a spacy group of extraterrestrial loonies and killer ostriches. Kristy Swanson, Hal Sparks.

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: After a honeymooning newlywed (Ben Stiller) realizes he's involved in a nightmarish marriage, he meets the woman of his dreams (Michelle Monaghan). Hilarious remake of the 1972 hit film that starred Charles Grodin and Cybill Shepherd. Stiller's father Jerry Stiller costars as Doc. Directed by Bobby and Peter Farrelly, who co-wrote the script with Kevin Barnett, Leslie Dixon and Scot Armstrong.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: In this heart pounding thriller, a young woman suspects that she's being quietly hunted by her own "double," who is slowly taking over her identity and might be planning to take her life.

programme.title: Bulworth
programme.desc: Writer-director-star Warren Beatty is a revelation as Jay Bulworth, a senator who's disenchanted with the political system and decides to speak the truth to his constituents---using rap. Halle Berry, Oliver Platt, Christine Baranski, Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three young women come of age amid romantic entanglements while working at a Connecticut pizzeria shortly after graduating from high school.

programme.title: Dolapo Is Fine
programme.desc: A story about a young Black girl's relationship with her hair and name, and how it helps her understand who she really is.

programme.title: Man of the Year
programme.desc: This hilarious political satire asks the question: What would happen if one of the country's funniest men became its most powerful? Robin Williams stars as a comedian who runs for president on a lark—and wins.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat sequel, a young couple must fight to survive after their car breaks down in the city during a night when all crime is legal.

programme.title: Fighting
programme.desc: Channing Tatum stars as a small-town kid inducted into the violent world of bare-knuckle boxing in this tense and gritty urban drama. Arriving in New York City with nothing but the shirt on his back, Shawn MacArthur earns a living by selling counterfeit goods on the street. Later, he crosses paths with crafty con artist Harvey Boarden, who offers to help the uneasy newcomer make some cash on the bare-knuckle circuit. Shawn quickly makes a name for himself by taking down every opponent he faces.

programme.title: Sleuth
programme.desc: Fresh and rewarding remake of the Broadway hit involving deadly cat-and-mouse games between a wickedly clever writer (Michael Caine) and his wife's lover (Jude Law), an actor whom he surprises with a most unusual moneymaking proposition. Caine played the lothario role in the 1972 original. Directed by Kenneth Branagh, co-produced with Law. Playwright Harold Pinter rewrote the script based on Anthony Shaffer's play. Law also played the Michael Caine title role in the 2004 remake of "Alfie."

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Hilarious underdog comedy about a trio of nerdy grown-ups with minimal athletic ability who form a three-man baseball team to challenge bullying Little Leaguers.

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: Sidesplitting battle-of-the-sexes romp about an estranged couple uncomfortably sharing their condo.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell

programme.title: 12 Mighty Orphans
programme.desc: This sports drama fictionalizes the inspiring story of the Mighty Mites: a formidable football team that consisted of scrawny orphans from Fort Worth, Texas. National glory was attained through their coach Rusty Russell (an orphan himself), who taught them the innovative techniques that made up for their relative lack of brawn.

programme.title: Dangerous Liaisons
programme.desc: Camille and Valmont are caught in a dangerous situation after working on a new plan to face their past ghosts.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: It's a battle for control over High Water and dreams of power, fame and fortune. Many secrets are revealed including the real murderer of East-O and the true identity of Saint Clip.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A lonely, obsessive cable installer becomes fixated on a customer.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A New York cop tries to deprive terrorists of their quarry at a Washington, D.C., airport.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: It's a battle for control over High Water and dreams of power, fame and fortune. Many secrets are revealed including the real murderer of East-O and the true identity of Saint Clip.

programme.title: School Dance
programme.desc: In this delightful coming-of-age story, a high-school student tries to join an elite dance crew in the hope of winning the attention of his dream girl.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In this star-studded period drama, two con artists are recruited by an FBI agent to infiltrate the treacherous world where New Jersey's politics and the mob intersect. However, it's never quite clear who is the swindler and who is the mark.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A factory worker is branded a spy after an attempt to take a virtual vacation goes horribly awry. Later, he joins a resistance movement in order to defeat a high-tech tyrant, and tries to recover his true identity in this mind-bending sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: In this exciting thriller based on the hit '80s TV series, an ex-Black Ops agent emerges from self-imposed retirement and decides to help the downtrodden after he saves a young woman from vicious Russian gangsters.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe.

programme.title: Die Hard 2

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: Thrills, chills and laughter abound in this adventure comedy about late-night security guard who is put to the test after the exhibits in the Smithsonian come to life and begin wreaking havoc. Determined to save the museum from destruction, Larry takes on a loose T. rex, Attila the Hun and Roman gladiators eager to wage the epic battles of years gone by.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: Lloyd Vogel is tasked with creating a profile of Fred Rogers, the creator and star of the successful children's program Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. However, Fred seems to have a different plan in mind. The interviewee suddenly becomes the interviewer, and he starts to help the writer sent for him in unexpected ways.

After her father finds out, they must navigate his disapproval and reclaim the stolen farm.

At a sci-fi convention, the cast from the canceled series "Galaxy Quest" is approached by a group of extraterrestrials who ask them to help with a raging war back home. Tony Shalhoub, Daryl Mitchell.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: A man is held captive and trained to be a personal attack dog for a vicious loan shark, but he escapes and seeks vengeance on his tormentor. Martial-arts superstar Jet Li is at his best in the unrated version of this explosive action-thriller from the director of "Transporter 2."

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: In this high-flying comedy, Uma Thurman gives a superb performance as a shrewish, possessive superhero who gets dumped by her regular-Joe boyfriend (Luke Wilson), and then decides to use her superpowers to exact revenge on him and his new love (Anna Faris). In a hilarious nod to "Fatal Attraction," Thurman substitutes live great-white-shark sushi for the boiled bunny. Directed by Ivan Reitman and written by Don Payne, who has scripted episodes of "The Simpsons."

programme.title: Janky Promoters
programme.desc: This hilarious showbiz comedy finds two club owners scoring big time when they book a famous rap act to play at their modest venue. Unfortunately, their plans quickly spin out of control and the two find themselves in way over their heads. Ice Cube, Mike Epps, Young Jeezy. Directed by Marcus Raboy.

programme.title: About Last Night
programme.desc: In this refreshingly honest romantic comedy, a man nursing a broken heart begins dating a woman who's grown cynical about love. As their relationship is tested over the course of a year, their best friends have their own sexually charged affair.

programme.title: The Fourth Angel
programme.desc: In this taut thriller, a magazine editor (Jeremy Irons) loses his wife and daughters during a terrorist hijacking. When the hijackers escape capture, the editor transforms into a violent warrior who infiltrates extremist cells and tries to rub out the terrorists for good. Forest Whitaker, Charlotte Rampling, Jason Priestley.

programme.title: Hard Rain
programme.desc: An armored-car guard and a thief vie for a fortune in waterlogged cash when a flood threatens a Midwestern town.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In this thrilling adventure, a Pompeii gladiator races to save his true love as Mount Vesuvius prepares to erupt in A.D. 79. As the lava starts to flow, he must escape the arena and rescue his lover before they are both turned to ash.

programme.title: The Father
programme.desc: At 80 years old, Anthony finds himself dependent on his daughter Anne for everything. Anne, however, is not planning on staying to take care of him as she wants to move to Paris to be with her boyfriend. Before she does, though, she wants to make sure that her father has someone who will look after him. Anthony detests this and tries his best to scare everyone Anne hires. But soon enough, his brain begins to play tricks on him.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali talks a suicidal stranger down from a ledge, using his unique brand of wit and wisdom.

programme.title: The Challenger
programme.desc: A Bronx mechanic's life changes when he and his mother are evicted from their home, prompting him to turn to boxing as a way to earn money. After winning his first big fight, a cable network decides to create a show about him called "The Challenger."

programme.title: McEnroe
programme.desc: The story of a legend told by the legend himself: John McEnroe. Nobody embodied the rockstar era of tennis more than John McEnroe. The original bad boy of the sport, McEnroe was famous not only for his epic matches, but also for his confrontations on and off the court. Accompanied by interviews with icons like Patty Smyth, Keith Richards, Billie Jean King, and Bjorn Borg, the legendary tennis ace gives an unflinching account of his triumphs, struggles, friendships, and rivalries.

programme.title: DIO: Dreamers Never Die
programme.desc: The narrative covers the career of heavy metal icon Ronnie James Dio. From his early beginnings in the 1950s as a doo-wop singer to his rise as a sought-after front man culminating in going solo, every aspect of Dio's career is covered. The retrospective includes interviews with family, friends, colleagues, band members, and peers and is the only estate-authorized documentary to cover Dio's entire career.

programme.title: Downeast
programme.desc: A young woman returns to her rural Maine hometown, reconnecting with her past while reconciling with her brother's unusual death years prior.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Rust Belt ex-con Russell is released from prison and must choose between escaping his life of poverty or saving his younger brother Rodney, who has fallen in with a dangerous crime ring.

programme.title: Crawlspace
programme.desc: A plumber is trapped in the crawlspace of a ruthless poachers' cabin.

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation
programme.desc: The tripleheader is headlined by Luis Nuñez and Carlos Arrieta.

programme.title: Private Parts
programme.desc: Tracing the turbulent career of radio and TV shock-jock Howard Stern, including his experiences as a struggling kid, his first attempts at spicing up his talk show, his married life and his rise to fame at New York's WNBC. Robin Quivers, Fred Norris, Mary McCormack, Gary Dell' Abate, Jackie Martling.

programme.title: X-Rated: The Greatest Adult Movies of All Time
programme.desc: A look at the top adult movies in film history.

programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: Writer-director Shane Black (who wrote "Lethal Weapon") puts a killer spin on this slam-bang salute to old-school noir detective yarns. Robert Downey Jr. and Val Kilmer are superb as a hapless hood and a gay PI looking into a mysterious death involving the sister of Downey's high-school crush (Michelle Monaghan). This is Black's directorial debut, and he tips his hat to pulp master Raymond Chandler by naming each chapter of the film after a Chandler book title.

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: An examination of the 2003 murder of Baylor University basketball player Patrick Dennehy by his friend Carlton Dotson, and the ensuing accusations aimed at the university and coach Dave Bliss.

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A documentary examining a controversial practice in Thailand's criminal justice system whereby inmates can earn their freedom by winning a series of Muay Thai fights. The focus is on Noy Khaopan, a convicted murderer who fights for his release.

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A cop in 2019 America is framed for massacring rioting civilians during a famine. After escaping from jail he tries to prove his innocence, but is captured along with an innocent civilian, and they are forced to participate in a violent game show called "The Running Man."

programme.title: Margaux
programme.desc: Eager for a weekend getaway of parties and relaxation, a group of twentysomethings rents a smart home vacation rental. Yet the home's sophisticated artificial intelligence programming system soon takes control, forcing the friends to fight their way out or face their end.

programme.title: Infinite Storm
programme.desc: The thriller tells the true story of professional climber Pam Bales. Facing an impending blizzard on her way down from Mount Washington, Bales discovers a stranded man in need of help. She undertakes the impossible mission of saving his life. With their lives on the line, they must leave the mountain together before nightfall.

programme.title: Out of Time
programme.desc: Denzel Washington is reunited with his "Devil in a Blue Dress" director, Carl Franklin, for this smart and steamy thriller. He plays a small-town Florida police chief who's been framed for murder and is racing against the clock to find the real killer.

programme.title: Wonderful Time of the Year, A
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown.

programme.title: Chloe
programme.desc: In this erotically charged drama, Catherine (Julianne Moore) suspects her husband David (Liam Neeson) may be cheating on her, so she hires a prostitute named Chloe (Amanda Seyfried) to flirt with him and report back to her about how he responds. However, Catherine eventually finds herself drawn to Chloe and the stories she shares of her erotic encounters with David.

programme.title: The Lighthouse
programme.desc: In the midst of a bracing storm, two lighthouse keepers fight to maintain their sanity while stranded on a strange and isolated New England island in the 1890s. But as the storm continues, the two men are forced to confront their true nature.

programme.title: High Life
programme.desc: Monte is one of several death row inmates given the opportunity to forgo their sentence in exchange for manning a suicide space mission to harvest energy from near a black hole. The ship's doctor is also conducting an experiment of her own, obsessively testing humans' ability to reproduce in space. The ragtag crew's close quarters and grim fate breed dissent and ultimately brutal violence.

programme.title: City of God
programme.desc: Fascinating adaptation of Paolo Lin's novel about a brutal Rio de Janeiro slum in the '60s and '70s, where a budding photographer observes the hopelessness of a society ruled by gangland justice.

programme.title: Afflicted
programme.desc: Two young travel bloggers attempting to document their journey around the world experience a bizarre encounter that leaves one of them instilled with superhuman powers in this inventive sci-fi thriller. Now, they must find the woman who infected him during a one-night stand gone awry.

programme.title: The Retreat
programme.desc: A couple at a crossroads in their relationship travel to a remote cabin to spend the weekend with friends. But when they arrive and find the cabin empty, they soon discover that they have unwittingly become the targets of a group of militant extremists.

programme.title: Memphis
programme.desc: An unstable Memphis musician suffers a creative dry spell while drifting aimlessly through the city, occasionally breaking his cycle of apathy by visiting his girlfriend, dropping into the studio or hanging out with his best friend.

programme.title: Old Henry
programme.desc: When widowed farmer Henry and his son Wyatt discover a riderless horse with blood on the saddle, they realize that fallen rider Curry has a satchel stuffed with cash and some dangerous men hot on his heels. But when the men arrive, Henry must defend himself using gun skills that shock those around him, raising questions about his past.

programme.title: Pete Lee: Tall, Dark, and Pleasant
programme.desc: Conflict-averse comedian Pete Lee talks sex, drugs and being too nice.

programme.title: Poser
programme.desc: Lennon is an aspiring podcaster who interviews local musicians she admires. As she starts to leave her comfort zone, her interviews lead her to her own musical ambitions. Finding inspiration from the music she admires, Lennon embarks on a journey of self-discovery and enlightenment.

programme.title: Mine 9
programme.desc: Two miles into the earth, nine Appalachian miners struggle to survive after a methane explosion leaves them with one hour of oxygen.

programme.title: Bitchin': The Sound and Fury of Rick James
programme.desc: Chronicling the life and legacy of funk and R&B icon Rick James.

programme.title: Booty Call
programme.desc: Upwardly mobile Rushon (Tommy Davidson) makes a bet with his womanizing friend Bunz (Jamie Foxx) that he can get his new girlfriend Nikki into bed before the night is over. As a safety move, Nikki has brought along her friend Lysterine, so Rushon invites Bunz---and a potential night of passion becomes a double-dating nightmare. Vivica A. Fox, Tamala Jones, Art Malik.

programme.title: The Gasoline Thieves
programme.desc: Mexican teenager Lalo wants to impress his crush by buying her a new smartphone. To make quick and easy cash, he begins working for a gang of local huachicoleros, who siphon off fuel then illegally sell the stolen gas on the black market. He soon finds himself in over his head with investigators on his trail.

programme.title: Midnight Sun
programme.desc: A sheltered girl named Katie has a rare disease that makes exposure to sunlight deadly. A chance encounter with her childhood crush, Charlie, leads to an unlikely summer romance that gets complicated when Katie finally reveals her medical condition.

programme.title: Poser
programme.desc: Lennon is an aspiring podcaster who interviews local musicians she admires. As she starts to leave her comfort zone, her interviews lead her to her own musical ambitions. Finding inspiration from the music she admires, Lennon embarks on a journey of self-discovery and enlightenment.

programme.title: Juniper
programme.desc: When a self-destructive teenager is suspended from school and asked to look after his feisty alcoholic grandmother as a punishment, the crazy time they spend together turns his life around.

programme.title: Beanpole
programme.desc: In Leningrad, two young women struggle to ascertain the meaning of their existence as their hope for a renewed future wanes amidst the devastation left by the Second World War. The women dream of restoring peace to their lives, digging through the rubble in search of solid foundations.

programme.title: American Badger
programme.desc: Cold-blooded hitman Badger is tasked with befriending and extracting information from a call girl who has a close connection with an Albanian mob boss. But when the order comes through to kill his new and unlikely ally, Badger finds his life rapidly spiraling out of control.

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe finds out what the ladies go through to become the next Miss Universe.

programme.title: The L Word: Generation Q
programme.desc: Alice and Tess discover some lies in their relationship; Shane has nowhere else to go to; Dani's romcom fantasy is ruined after she finds something that will test Sophie and Finley's trust; Micah and Maribel struggle with parenthood.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: A man stranded alone on a deserted island makes one last attempt at escape after a dead body washes up on shore. The talking corpse provides the castaway with a number of unexpected tools, which he'll need if he wants to be reunited with his love.

programme.title: The Humans
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, the Blakes gathers to celebrate until a series of strange sounds punctuate the revelation of family struggles, including the difficulties of the grandmother's Alzheimer's diagnosis and the daughter's tumultuous coming out. Based on the Tony Award-winning one-act play.

programme.title: Bad Hombres
programme.desc: A documentary following the binational pro baseball team, the Tecolotes de los Dos Laredos, during their 2019 season. Traveling between both of their home stadiums in Mexico & the U.S., the team becomes stuck in the middle of the border wall debate.

programme.title: Moon Manor
programme.desc: The biographical dramedy centers on Jimmy Carrozo's last day on Earth. Battling Alzheimer's, he decides to invite family and friends, along with a personal death doula and an obituary writer, to his very own festive funeral. What follows is an insightful, hilarious look at the joy of living and the art of dying.

programme.title: Demonic
programme.desc: This sci-fi horror tale finds the characters crossing the line of reality and existing in an environment where they begin to question their own existence. The story follows a woman who has long been estranged from her mother. However, during the course of a technological experiment, the paths of the mother and daughter meet again, as secrets of their lives slowly emerge while supernatural demons are accidentally unleashed by the process.

programme.title: Monkey Shines
programme.desc: An experiment provides a simian aide that has been trained to assist a quadriplegic, but the man feels a strange connection with the mammal, which is exhibiting "feelings."

programme.title: Rose: A Love Story
programme.desc: Rose struggles with an illness that makes her thirst for blood, forcing her and her husband to isolate themselves in the woods.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Stephenie Meyer's romantic and suspenseful best seller that started the phenomenon comes to life in this action-packed chronicle of the modern-day love story between a teenage girl and a vampire. Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson star. Billy Burke, Peter Facinelli, Elizabeth Reaser. Directed by Catherine Hardwicke.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: This thrilling second installment of the popular "Twilight" saga finds Bella Swan in pieces after her vampire boyfriend leaves town. She soon reconnects with a childhood friend and realizes he's hiding a dark secret that may hold the key to her survival.

programme.title: DIO: Dreamers Never Die
programme.desc: The narrative covers the career of heavy metal icon Ronnie James Dio. From his early beginnings in the 1950s as a doo-wop singer to his rise as a sought-after front man culminating in going solo, every aspect of Dio's career is covered. The retrospective includes interviews with family, friends, colleagues, band members, and peers and is the only estate-authorized documentary to cover Dio's entire career.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After twenty-five peaceful years, Woodsboro once again faces Ghostface, the entity that previously shook the small and quiet town with its brutal crimes. The new perpetrator behind the mask goes after everyone related to the original murderers, opening old wounds once forcefully tucked away in the past. Sam Carpenter then enlists the help of the town's former Sheriff, Dewey Riley, and it doesn't take long until Sidney Prescott returns to face her old enemy.

programme.title: George & Tammy
programme.desc: Tammy questions whether George can handle the pressures of superstardom.

programme.title: Dead For A Dollar
programme.desc: The western centers on bounty hunter Max Borlund and his fateful confrontation with lifelong nemesis Joe Cribbens. Borlund ventures into Mexico to pursue the kidnapped wife of a wealthy man. But on his journey, he reunites with Cribbens years after he sent him to jail.

programme.title: Dead in Tombstone
programme.desc: A gang overruns a small mining town, murder their own leader all for a cold-blooded power grab. Guerrero finds himself confronted by Satan offering him a proposition to deliver the six souls of his former gang and he will escape damnation.

programme.title: Dead Again in Tombstone
programme.desc: A cowboy evades a band of soldiers and protects a relic that could end the world.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: The sole survivor of a failed heist is forced by the police to piece together events leading up to the deaths of his partners. Meanwhile, the motivations of the enigmatic criminal mastermind who planned the job remain a mystery.

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: North Hollywood resident Michael is a teenager who's active in many things like any young boy his age, namely hanging out with his buddies, doing various sports like water polo, even being active in their church. Skateboarding remains high on his list, so much so that he plans to make it as a professional in this field. But his father is pressuring him to focus on his studies so he can go to college.

programme.title: How to Be a Latin Lover
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, a past-his-prime Latin lover moves in with his sister and her son after his wife leaves him. As he teaches his nephew how to play the game of seduction, he vows to return to his lifestyle of being a kept man for an older woman.

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Three bumbling brothers pull a bank heist on Christmas Eve, but struggle to escape the small-town scene of the crime.

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a shy American saleswoman whose doctor misdiagnoses her. When she believes that death is calling, she decides to go out with a bang and heads to Europe for an extended stay at a swanky resort.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: This spirited semiautobiography rocks! Writer-director Cameron Crowe, who wrote for Rolling Stone as a 15-year-old, charts a teen's coming of age around the Age of Aquarius. Patrick Fugit is wonderful as the young incarnation of Crowe, who learns all about life, love, sex, drugs and especially rock and roll while touring with a rising band. Kate Hudson, Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand.

programme.title: Hollywoodland
programme.desc: "L.A. Confidential" meets "Chinatown" in this involving and masterfully realized crime thriller. Adrien Brody gives a compelling performance as a glory-seeking gumshoe hired to investigate the suspicious 1959 death of actor George Reeves (Ben Affleck), who played Superman on TV. His probe turns up some big names who will do anything to stay out of the tawdry Tinseltown case. Diane Lane, Bob Hoskins, Joe Spano, Lois Smith, Robin Tunney, Ted Atherton. Directed by Allen Coulter.

programme.title: The Switch
programme.desc: This delightfully offbeat comedy centers on a single woman who decides to conceive via artificial insemination. But seven years later, she reunites with a friend and comes to question the child's paternity after he recalls a last-minute mix-up involving the sperm sample she used.

programme.title: How to Be a Latin Lover
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, a past-his-prime Latin lover moves in with his sister and her son after his wife leaves him. As he teaches his nephew how to play the game of seduction, he vows to return to his lifestyle of being a kept man for an older woman.

programme.title: The L Word: Generation Q
programme.desc: Alice and Tess discover some lies in their relationship; Shane has nowhere else to go to; Dani's romcom fantasy is ruined after she finds something that will test Sophie and Finley's trust; Micah and Maribel struggle with parenthood.

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: This spirited semiautobiography rocks! Writer-director Cameron Crowe, who wrote for Rolling Stone as a 15-year-old, charts a teen's coming of age around the Age of Aquarius. Patrick Fugit is wonderful as the young incarnation of Crowe, who learns all about life, love, sex, drugs and especially rock and roll while touring with a rising band. Kate Hudson, Billy Crudup, Frances McDormand.

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe finds out what the ladies go through to become the next Miss Universe.

programme.title: The Lighthouse
programme.desc: In the midst of a bracing storm, two lighthouse keepers fight to maintain their sanity while stranded on a strange and isolated New England island in the 1890s. But as the storm continues, the two men are forced to confront their true nature.

programme.title: The Novice
programme.desc: Alex Dall, a university student, seems to be obsessing about rowing. As a member of her school's rowing team, she is seen working herself to the bones as a novice team member, often sacrificing her academics and other aspects of her life. Things change a bit when she meets Dani, a teacher's assistant who later becomes her girlfriend. However, even with love now in the equation, Alex still seems to be heading toward self-destruction in her life obsessions.

programme.title: Peaceful Warrior
programme.desc: Scott Mechlowicz is outstanding in this inspiring, fact-based tale of a seriously injured college gymnast who tries to make a comeback. Nick Nolte is effective as the blue-collar mentor who helps him get back on his feet and back into competition. Directed by Victor Salva from a script by Kevin Bernhardt, who adapted the autobiographical best seller "Way of the Peaceful Warrior" by Dan Millman, the character played by Mechlowicz.

In small-town Illinois, aspiring filmmaker Pat Johnson contends with the pitfalls of adolescence, from bullying to young love. However, when he discovers a new science fiction film, he may find himself at the center of events much greater than himself. Based on true events.

programme.title: Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: A partying troublemaker learns about holiday spirit when a judge sentences him to community service as a referee for a kids team.

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: Jerry Selbee stumbles upon a mathematical hole in the Massachusetts lottery and recruits his wife, Marge, to help him secure the hefty cash prize.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: James L. Brooks' acclaimed romantic comedy about a plucky New York waitress (Helen Hunt) and a phobic, curmudgeonly novelist (Jack Nicholson). Greg Kinnear costars as his gay neighbor in this story of love, forgiveness and acceptance. The three leads were Oscar-nominated. Cuba Gooding Jr., Skeet Ulrich, Shirley Knight.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Diane Keaton are dynamic in this witty romantic comedy. Nicholson plays an aging Lothario with a young girlfriend. He meets his soul mate, however, when he's introduced to his lover's mother, a playwright who can't stand the sight of him.

programme.title: Santa Claus: The Movie
programme.desc: Saint Nick hires an elf with sloppy craftsmanship to work at his North Pole toy factory.

programme.title: A Ghost Story
programme.desc: A dead man returns to haunt his wife in this moving drama, manifesting as a ghost wearing a sheet with eyeholes over his head. He remains stuck in the house even after she moves out, and observes its various occupants over the course of several decades. At the same time, he tries to communicate with a ghost living in the house next door.

programme.title: Lamb
programme.desc: This mysterious drama is set in Iceland and follows the story of Maria and Ingvar, a couple who has been living on a faraway meadow farm, trying to cope with being childless. However, when one of the ewes in their herd gives birth to a strange lamb creature, the couple cares for it as if it were their own child. Soon, they will find out that the newborn will bring something else to their relationship.

programme.title: Midsommar
programme.desc: Just as their relationship is on the brink of falling apart, couple Dani and Christian are brought closer by a family tragedy. The mourning Dani then joins Christian and his friends, Josh and Mark, on a trip to a rural Swedish village that is celebrating a once-in-a-blue-moon festival. As the tourists partake in the celebrations, they discover that the idyllic community holds many unnerving secrets, and it all unfolds in broad daylight.

programme.title: Color of Night
programme.desc: Retreating from New York after one of his patients commits suicide, a traumatized psychologist stays with a friend and fellow psychologist in Los Angeles. When his friend is discovered murdered, he takes on his remaining clients and finds himself caught up in a world of complications.

programme.title: Major Arcana
programme.desc: A carpenter returns to his hometown in Vermont, hoping to turn a new leaf by constructing a log cabin with his own hands. An unexpected encounter with a former flame leads to a cathartic confrontation with the darker elements of his past: poverty and addiction.

programme.title: Gloria Bell
programme.desc: After her divorce, Gloria decides to live her life fast and loose frequenting clubs and doing whatever her heart desires. She then meets Arnold and things turn serious much faster than she anticipated. The more intimate they get, the more she struggles to fully commit, fearing the same outcome as her last relationship.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: It takes Aaron Falk 20 years to return to his hometown, and it is because Luke, one of his childhood friends, has died. Luke has killed himself after murdering his family, falling victim to the madness that is going through their area. As Falk stays to investigate the case, he opens up an old wound: the death of Ellie. He realizes that a connection can be made between the two crimes, but as he does, he finds himself needing to prove not only Luke's, but also his innocence.

programme.title: Lacy's Christmas Do-Over
programme.desc: Lacy, a career-driven business woman, goes to a B&B in Illinois at the advice of a new therapist. There she finds herself stuck in a mystical, small Christmas town, reliving the same day over and over. Lacy must figure out how to escape.

programme.title: Madonna & Basquiat
programme.desc: An examination of the story behind the romantic relationship between Madonna and Basquiat.

programme.title: The House of Mirth
programme.desc: Strong performances, gorgeous costumes and sumptuous art direction distinguish this adaptation of Edith Wharton's novel. Gillian Anderson stars as a unmarried woman who falls from grace in early 20th-century New York City, where the upper classes have little use for an independent female who refuses to play by the rules. Eric Stoltz, Anthony LaPaglia, Laura Linney, Dan Aykroyd, Elizabeth McGovern.

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Tail
programme.desc: A widowed museum curator finds love with a single dad thanks to some matchmaking by their canine pals, who recently made a love connection. The pair plan a Christmas wedding, but multiple complications threaten the union.

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Jude Law and Best Supporting Actress Renée Zellweger star in Anthony Minghella's sweeping Civil War epic about a pampered preacher's daughter struggling to survive while waiting for her beau to return from battle.

programme.title: Queen of the Morning Calm
programme.desc: Debra is a young Korean sex worker who's always lived at the mercy of men. She struggles with her role as a mother to her precocious and quirky daughter Mona, while trying to better herself by taking accounting courses and keep track of her gambler boyfriend.

programme.title: Club C. Presents a Queer Comedy Extravaganza!
programme.desc: Emmy nominee and Tony winner Alan C. hosts this cabaret-style gathering featuring seven up-and-coming queer comedians that represent not only the diversity of the queer spectrum, but also of comedy styling, from stand-up to characters to musical performances. The 75-minute special features Joe Castle Baker, Julia Shiplett, duo Zach Teague & Drew Lausch, Nori Reed, Pat Regan, and Larry Owens.

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: With 50 million albums sold worldwide and nine Grammy awards under her belt, Sheryl Crow can be considered as one of the most successful artists in American music. The documentary film Sheryl centers around the life and times of this icon, employing intimate interviews, camcorder footage, and archival materials to paint a complete image of her life—from her humble beginnings, impressive career breakthrough, medical challenges, and sustained success.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: An intimate look into the life of controversial Irish singer-songwriter Sinéad O'Connor. Beginning with the release of her debut album in 1987, the narrative charts six years in O'Connor's career filled with rebellion, iconoclasm, and creativity as the musician strove to rewrite the script of mainstream music and femininity in the face of rampant sociopolitical and sociocultural change.

programme.title: Meet Me in the Bathroom
programme.desc: An in-depth look into the early 2000s New York City rock scene. In a time when many thought the city would no longer produce iconic rock bands, a rebirth of sorts swept through the city. Following bands like The Strokes, LCD Soundsystem, Yeah Yeah Yeahs, and more, this documentary takes you back to where it all started. Based on the book written by Lizzie Goodman.

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: After artistic free spirit Ema's life is upended by a failed adoption of a seven-year-old child, her marriage is put in shambles. Embarking on a journey of personal liberation and self-discovery, she dances and seduces her way into a brand new life.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married
programme.desc: A wayward young woman leaves rehab to attend her older sister's wedding, wreaking emotional havoc on the idyllic weekend gathering. Anne Hathaway ("The Devil Wears Prada") gives a superb performance in this exuberant dramedy from director Jonathan Demme ("The Silence of the Lambs"). Rosemarie DeWitt, Bill Irwin, Tunde Adebimpe, Debra Winger.

programme.title: When Joan Kissed Barbra
programme.desc: Before Joan Rivers and Barbra Streisand were famous, they were in a play together. Rivers demanded she be cast without even reading the script. The result: the role she was given called for a love scene between herself and Streisand.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: It takes Aaron Falk 20 years to return to his hometown, and it is because Luke, one of his childhood friends, has died. Luke has killed himself after murdering his family, falling victim to the madness that is going through their area. As Falk stays to investigate the case, he opens up an old wound: the death of Ellie. He realizes that a connection can be made between the two crimes, but as he does, he finds himself needing to prove not only Luke's, but also his innocence.

programme.title: Sisters with Transistors
programme.desc: This music documentary spotlights the overlooked history of the first generation of female pioneers and innovators in electronic music. By using archival footage and audio, it explores how they embraced synthesizers and sampling — while struggling in a male-dominated space and a generally sexist era — and made a memorable impact on popular culture.

programme.title: Saving Christmas
programme.desc: A young boy and his friends launch an investigation to find out the truth about Santa. They discover he's real and he's creating toys right in their town.

programme.title: Mr. Malcolm's List
programme.desc: Jeremy Malcolm is the most sought bachelor in the English countryside. Rumors surface of a list that lays out all the perfect qualities for Mr. Malcolm's future wife. A suitor from out of town hears about Mr. Malcolm and is convinced she can win him over. Based on the novel Mr. Malcolm's List by Suzanne Allain.

programme.title: Love Spreads
programme.desc: Following a meteoric rise to fame, tensions rise amidst the indie band Glass Heart as their producer demands their sophomore album. With their careers on the line, three wholly different singer-songwriters experience a creative clash as they strive to write and record the new album.

programme.title: Låt den rätte komma in
programme.desc: Denna mörka svenska skräckfilm följer vänskapen mellan en mobbad tolvåring och hans nya granne – en egendomlig ung flicka som råkar vara en vampyr.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Summer 1939. The Nazi High Command send their daughters to finishing school in England. A teacher senses the coming atrocities, but must navigate a web of double-agents to raise the alarm.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: In this stunning thriller shot in one continuous and unedited take, a beautiful Spanish party girl in Berlin unwittingly becomes an accessory to a bank robbery after she befriends a group of men at a bar.
